Elle a été informée de nouvelles opportunités de crédit éducation qu’offre l’IMF Hekima pour financer anticipativement les frais de scolarité. Ainsi, ce nouveau prêt lui servira de payer les frais de scolarité de ses enfants pour qu’ils ne soient plus exclus des cours durant toute l’année scolaire 2013-2014. Ce parent rêve un avenir meilleur pour ses enfants et souhaite les voir devenir des ingénieurs informaticiens, médecin, cadre d’entreprise, professeur d’université, Révérend pasteur, parlementaires, etc. Au finish, elle salut grandement l’initiative spéciale de Hekima surtout de ce projet d’impact social pendant cette période de la reconstruction de l’Est du pays.
texts.en:
The client, Takasana, is a nurse at a medical center in her city. She is the parent of one university student and one primary school student who are regularly enrolled in their schools.

She was informed of new educational loan opportunities from IMF Hekima that can be used to pay school fees in advance. She will use this loan to pay her children’s school fees so that they will not be excluded from classes in the 2013-2014 school year.

This parent dreams of a better future for her children and would like to see them become computer engineers, doctors, business executives, university professors, reverend pastors, members of parliament, etc. 

In the end, she would like to recognize Hekima’s special initiative, and especially this social impact project during this period of reconstruction in the east of the country.

loans.use: pay for her children's schooling.

loans.name: Nargiss

texts.en:
Nargiss is 49 years old, a widow and the mother of two children. One of her sons is shown in the photo sitting with Nargiss. He is a driver by trade and provides transportation services using his three-wheeled rickshaw. He has been driving a rickshaw for many years to meet the family expenses, but now it requires proper maintenance to keep it in its functional routine. 

For this reason, Nargiss has applied for a loan of Rs 40,000 for her son. He wants to buy new tires for his vehicle. This will help him drive more smoothly and provide better transport service to his passengers. Nargiss is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her son and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to buy new tires for her son's vehicle.

loans.name: Espoir Group

texts.fr: Madame Mulasi est présidente dans le  groupe de credit Espoir.Elle est veuve à l’âge de 46 ans, mère de 6 enfants tous scolarisés et vendeuse ambulante dans la ville de Bukavu.  Ce nouveau prêt va l’aider à acheter 25kgs de farine de manioc, 5 litres d’huile végétale, 5kg de sucre et des ingrédients pour la préparation de beignets qui est son activité principale.  Son objectif est de devenir une grande commerçante dans les jours à venir. Elle remercie Hekima pour l’encadrement des femmes pauvres économiquement actives.
texts.en: Mulasi is president of the credit group Espoir. She is a widow at 46 years old, the mother of 6 children all attending school, and a street vendor in the town of Bukavu. This new loan will help to buy 25kgs of cassava flour, 5 liters of vegetable oil, 5kg sugar and ingredients for making donuts, which is her main business. Her goal is to become a great retailer in the future. She thanks Hekima for supporting economically active poor women.

loans.use: buy 25kgs of cassava flour, 5 liters of vegetable oil, 5kg sugar and ingredients

loans.name: Ruksaar

texts.en:
Ruksaar is a 29-year-old married woman. She, along with her husband, is in the business of making artificial jewelry and has been doing it for many years. The man shown in the photo is Ruksaar’s husband. 

The business has great potential for growth, and Ruksaar is actively helping her husband as this business is the only source of income for them. They have five children and are motivated to provide them with the basic necessities of life including food, health, and education.

In order to meet the orders on time and boost their sales, Ruksaar requested a loan of 40,000 PKR to purchase raw materials such as silver, gold, and dozens of artificial gems and pearls. She hopes to increase their net income and wishes to spend it on providing a quality education for her children.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials such as silver, gold, and dozens of artificial gems and pearls.

loans.name: Herminia

texts.en:
Herminia is applying for a loan of $1,000 from TRM (Tuba Rai Metin). She is married and has two children; she is 34 years old. She is running a mini shop  in front of her house and she will use the loan to buy stock to keep in her store such as shirts, trousers, shorts, short sleeves, long sleeves, pants for school children, and clothes for church. She is making good money from selling clothing and she wants to apply for a bigger loan in the future. 
Herminia is living in a town near the school; her kiosk is located in a strategic place where many people come to shop, including students.

loans.use: To buy shirts, trousers, shorts, short sleeves, long sleeves, pants for school children, and clothes for church

loans.name: Hong

texts.en:
Hong is a 52-year-old farmer and a loving father of five children, three of whom have been settled for marriage. Hong cultivates rice on his own land, which is located in Prey Veng province. He was taught the trade by his parents ever since he was a little boy. He works alongside his wife every day and also has some support from his children. Farming is the important source of his family’s income.

Hong is currently requesting a loan to buy construction supplies in order to build a safe latrine, and to pay for laborers to perform construction. In this way, he can promote the family's health and improve their general living conditions. The water loan program, offered by HKL with a special rate, has helped to encourage Hong to focus on ensuring healthy living conditions to safeguard the health of his family and protect the environment.

loans.use: to buy construction supplies in order to build a safe latrine, and to pay for laborers to perform construction.

loans.name: Lauli

texts.en:
Lauli, a 51-year-old married man, used the previous loan to buy cattle to sell as meat in his butchery. He also does farming and cattle rearing as his side income. His business is affected by price fluctuations and also by limited capital for expansion. He desires to educate his children to university level.

Lauli is requesting a loan to buy more cattle to sell in his butcher shop.

loans.use: to buy more cattle to sell as meat in his butchery.

loans.name: Omer

texts.en:
Omer is 26 years old, and he works as an independent vendor, selling plastic bags. He lives in Taiz, Yemen. He works every day and his primary customers are his neighbors, family members, and friends. This has allowed him to earn income to support his family.

With the motivation of strengthening his business, he has requested a loan to buy plastic bags to use for resale. 

Omer's dream is to grow and strengthen his business, offering his customers a larger variety of excellent quality products at a good price. This will make his business more profitable so he can enjoy a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy plastic bags to use for resale.

loans.name: Al Dalaa Group

texts.en:
Dalal is the featured borrower of Al Dalaa's Group. She is the one seated in the middle of the photo.  Dalal and the two other group members are neighbors and friends. They decided to form a group to apply for a loan from Kiva partner, Al Majmoua.

Dalal is a 51-year-old married mother of two children. She has been working as a hairdresser for the past thirty years. She works out of her home and is well known in her region for her good reputation and special talent.  The loan will be invested in developing Dalal's business by buying necessary hair and cosmetics products. It will also be used to pay for her increasing family expenses.

As for the other group members, Fayza is the lady at the left and Hiba is the pregnant lady at the right. Hiba will invest her portion of the loan to pay for last minute needs to prepare for her baby.

loans.use: To buy hair and cosmetics products and provide for their family's needs

loans.name: Pyapy Mbarete Group

texts.es:
Pyapy Mbarete está en su ciclo número doce del programa de comité de mujeres, donde cada una está haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, para conocer la situación en la que se encuentran y así superar su pobreza.
Una integrante es la Sra. Vanesa, quien es empleada doméstica, y además se dedica a hacer bordados variados, y por medio de estos trabajos ayuda a su familia. Comenta que es muy sacrificado trabajar de empleada doméstica y a la vez hacer sus bordados, pero el esfuerzo vale la pena, ya que ayuda a su familia.
Quiere seguir haciendo sus bordados, es por eso que está pidiendo de este préstamo, para poder comprar hilos variados, como telas.
texts.en:
Pyapy Mbarete is in its 12th loan cycle with the women’s communal bank program, where each  is completing the elimination of poverty survey in order to understand the situation in which they find themselves, and in this way, overcome their poverty.

One member is Señora Vanesa, who is a housekeeper. She also does various kinds of embroidery, and through this work she helps her family.  She says that it is very demanding to work as a housekeeper and at the same time, work doing her embroidery, but it is worth the effort because it helps her family. 

She wants to continue doing her embroidery, which is why she is requesting this loan: so that she will be able to buy various threads and fabrics.

loans.use: to buy thread and fabric for embroidery.

loans.name: Madalena

texts.en:
Madalena seeks a $1,000 loan to improve her business. She is married and she has a mini-shop, where many people come to buy products every day. She will buy some additional supplies, such as sports pants, shirts (long and short sleeved), and mattresses.She has been involving herself in business activities since 2002. She feels so comfortable running her business because she can earn money every day.

Running a business has made Madalena independent because she can be responsible for herself and can also help her family. She hopes to run a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: to buy sports pants, shirts (long and short sleeved) and mattresses

loans.name: Kavumbi

texts.en:
Kavumbi is a 54-year-old woman, married with two children aged 20 and 18 years old whom she supports. This is her second loan of Ksh.20,000. She was introduced to VisionFund Kenya  by a VisionFund officer. She sells milk, her business is located at Ganda. She has been in this business for thirteen years and she earns a monthly income of Ksh.14,000. 

Kavumbi is planning to use the loan to purchase more milk from neighbors and also buy storage equipment for her business. She will use the profit to expand the business. Her hopes and dreams for the future are to expand her business and educate her children.

loans.use: To purchase more milk from neighbors and to buy storage equipment for her business

loans.name: Musarat

texts.en:
Musarat is 32 years old and a married woman. Eight years ago she began stitching clothes in her house because her husband is a rickshaw driver and earns insufficient income to support the needs of the family members alone. She stitches clothes for the people living around her house and uses the income to support her entire family. However, due to lack of availability of funds she is unable to meet the daily demand of her customers. 

For this reason she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of Rs 40,000 to purchase more reels of thread along with packs of buttons and laces in various colors. This will allow her to stitch up more dresses on time to generate a healthier source of income. She is in her third loan cycle with good credit history.

loans.use: to purchase more reels of thread along with packs of buttons and laces in various colors.

loans.name: Zahida

texts.en: Zahida is a 41-year-old married woman and the mother of 4 children. She has been providing flour grinding services in her community with the support of her husband, who is also shown in the photo. They know the techniques of grinding very well and have gained five years of experience in this field.  In that time they have become famous for providing fine quality flour and now earn enough to support the needs of their family members. In order to purchase a new grinding machine, Zahida contacted Kashf Foundation and applied a loan of PKR 40,000. This will help her to cater to more customers time after time, which ultimately helps in generating more cash. She is in her 5th loan cycle with a good credit history. She wishes to spend part of her profits on the betterment of her family members.

loans.use: to purchase a new grinding machine.

loans.name: Enyanya Group

texts.fr: Madame Kabamba, femme ambitieuse et  courage de l’association d’affaire Enyanya ;  est  commerçante depuis plus de 15ans à un marché public de la ville.  Agée de 49 ans, elle est mère de 9enfants qui vont tous à l’école et est engagée à un agent de la fonction publique. Elle sollicite ce nouveau prêt pour se procurer  150 kgs de fretins fumés.  Le plus grand obstacle de sa profession c’est la vente à credit mais qu’à cela ne tienne elle veut devenir grossiste et achever la scolarité de ses enfants. Elle remercie Hekima pour tout.
texts.en:
Madame Kabamba is an ambitious and courageous woman from the Enyanya business association. For over 15 years, she has been a shopkeeper in her city’s public market. 

She is 49 years old and has 9 children who all go to school. She is engaged to a civil servant. 

She is asking for this new loan to buy 150 kgs of smoked fish. 

The biggest obstacle in her profession is selling for credit, but that won't prevent her from becoming a wholesaler and paying for her children’s schooling. She thanks Hekima for everything.

loans.use: buy 150 kgs of smoked fish.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a closet for the kitchen, pay for plumbing work in the bathroom to prevent water from leaking and install wood doors in the bedroom. This work will help him improve his house and make it better.

loans.name: Kanizan

texts.en: Kanizan is a 55-year-old married woman; she has been running a business selling and purchasing animals for many years. She buys animals (baby goats & calves) at low prices, brings them up and sells them near the occasion of Eid-ul-Azha (a religious event in Muslims countries). She has gradually improved her business with the support of Kashf foundation; currently she is requesting a loan of PKR 40,000 to purchase two more calves. She is in her 3rd loan cycle with a good repayment history.  She hopes to grow her business and dreams of providing better standards of living to her children through all her hard work in her business.

loans.use: to purchase two more calves.

loans.name: Maqboola

texts.en: Maqboola is a 48-year-old married lady who has been running a small general store in her community for many years.  She offers a variety of grocery items at a reasonable price and has retained many customers who regularly shop at her store. She makes enough to provide for her family. To make her store fully stocked she has requested a loan of PKR 40,000 which she will use to buy stock of rice, sugar and flour from the market at lower rates. In this way she will be able to meet the increasing demand consistently. She wishes to utilize part of her revenues to increase her business capital.

loans.use: to buy stock of rice, sugar and flour.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more ingredients in hopes of increasing her sales.

loans.name: Asia

texts.en: Asia is a 32-year-old married woman. She has 5 children. She has been involved in tailoring for a period of about 12 years and is proud to be contributing to her household income. When Asia was not earning, her family was going through a severe financial crisis that compelled her to use her stitching skills in a productive manner as her husband was the sole bread winner of the family. Over time she attained a good number of customers. To help her continue operations of her business, she has requested a loan of PKR 40,000 to buy stock of threads in different colors, along with packs of zippers, buttons and lace to meet her increasing demand. In addition to repaying the loan, she will use part of her revenues to deal with personal expenses.

loans.use: to buy stock of threads in different colors along with packs of zippers, buttons and lace.

loans.name: Elisa

texts.en:
A $1,000 loan is offered to Elisa to improve her business. She is married and has two children. She opened her kiosk in 2009 with her own working capital. 

She will use the loan to buy stock to keep in her store like candles, oils, fish, sugar, coffee, salt, noodles, cigarettes, eggs and water. She is generating a good income from selling.

She has been thinking of running a big business after years of involving herself in doing business. She is living in a town with her family.

loans.use: to buy candles, oils, fish, sugar, coffee, salt, noodles, cigarettes, eggs and water.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more beverages to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy medicine for resale

loans.name: Al Nahda Group

texts.en:
Insaf is a 62-year-old married mother of three and the featured borrower from the Al Nahda group. She is sitting at the far left side of the picture, Mayyasa is the lady in the center and Hiba is the lady on the right. Insaf is acquiring a loan with other group members from Kiva partner Al Majmoua because they have always been neighbours and friends.

Insaf has been working in the embroidery business and as a straw artisan for 10 years. Her business is an important source of income for her family. That's why she puts so much effort into developing it, which has resulted in the acquired loan. She will invest her loan in increasing her business merchandise with special embroidery, which is newly released and needed to expand her production and attract new customers. 

She will also use part of the loan for maintenance at her house to keep it a healthy living environment. She hopes to stay in good health and able to respond to different customer needs.

loans.use: To increase her business merchandise with special embroidery, newly released and needed to expand her production and attract new customers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and a weighing scale

loans.name: Hon

texts.en:
Hon is a 61-year-old married woman and a mother of five children. She currently lives with her family and three unmarried children in a remote area of Baray district in Kampong Thom province. Hon has been engaged in a rice-farming business and raising birds at home. Through her hardships and perseverance, she is able to earn a suitable income of KHR 40,000 per day, which she normally uses for food and other costs of living. 

Hon is currently requesting a loan to buy a piece of land for farming so that she can increase production and the income for her family. Her business plan is to continue developing her business and to make a stable income to meet her children’s needs. She is very thankful to all lenders in advance.

loans.use: to buy a piece of land for farming.

loans.name: Marta Alicia

texts.es: Marta de 46 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos de 22 años, 11 años y 10 años de edad. Marta se gana la vida mediante la prestación de servicios domésticos. De esta forma se gana la vida y colabora con los gastos del hogar. Desea mejorar las paredes de su vivienda las cuales están hechas de bahareque y necesitan que se cambien lo antes posible ya que se encuentran deterioradas. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina, vara de castilla y madera. Espera poder tener accesos al financiamiento ya que no cuenta con el capital para hacer el desembolso.
texts.en:
Marta, 46, lives in her own house along with her life partner and her children of 22, 11 and 10 years. Marta makes her living by offering domestic services. In this manner, she earns her living and helps with the expenses of the home. She wishes to improve the walls of her home, which are made of sugar cane and mud and need to be changed as soon as possible since they are deteriorated.

For the above, she is applying for this FUSAI loan to invest in the purchase of metal siding, reeds and wood. She hopes to be able to have access to financing given that she does not have the capital to make the expense.

loans.use: to buy: metal siding, reeds and wood.

loans.name: Leona

texts.es: La señora Leona actualmente vive en Entre Ríos, es madre soltera y tiene 3 hijos dependientes. Se dedica a la agricultura, su principal fuente de ingreso proviene de la producción de yuca la cual es estacionaria, para la misma es necesario utilizar la mayor mano de obra posible para obtener un mayor rendimiento pero esto aumena los costos de producción, por ello la señora decidió ampliar su cultivo y realizar un mantenimiento de malezas durante la etapa de producción, por lo mismo solicita un crédito para  el mantenimiento de yuca, de esta forma incrementara el rendimiento de su producción como también sus ingresos y su nivel de vida.
texts.en:
Leona lives in Entre Ríos. She is a single mother with three dependent children. She works in agriculture. Her main source of income is growing yucca. 

For these crops, it is necessary to hire as many workers as possible to obtain a better yield, but this raises the cost of production. Leona has decided to expand her crops and weed during the harvest season. Therefore, she is applying for a loan to maintain her yucca crops. In this way, she will increase the yield of her harvest as well as her income and quality of life.

loans.use: to maintain her yucca crops.

loans.name: Kuña Aty Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Kuña Aty está en el 1er ciclo, es un grupo nuevo, que tiene muchas esperanzas de poder trabajar juntas y por medio de ese trabajo ayudarse las unas a las otras.
Victoria es una de las que forma este grupo, es una mujer muy entusiasta, y que quiere crecer, es por ello que decidió unirse a este grupo. Ella se dedica a la venta de frutas y de verduras, y ya que sus productos son siempre de primera, pudo hacerse de muy buena clientela. Este préstamo lo pide para poder invertirlo en la compra de frutas de estación y también para verduras frescas.
texts.en:
The group called Kuña Aty is in its first cycle. It is a new group that has many hopes of being able to work together and by way of this work help each other.

Victoria is one of those who forms this group. She is a very enthusiastic woman, and she wants to grow; it's for this that she decided to join this group. She works selling fruits and vegetables, and since her products are always first-class, she could make a good clientele for herself. She asks for this loan to be able to invest it in the purchase of seasonal fruits and also for fresh vegetables.

loans.use: to buy seasonal fruits and fresh vegetables.

loans.name: La Victoria Group

texts.es:
La Victoria es un grupo que se formó con la unión de amigas y vecinas de la ciudad de San Lorenzo, donde están en su ciclo número diez del programa de comité de mujeres. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde a través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo y las aplicaciones de los comportamientos vitales se encuentran mejorando su situación de pobreza.
Una de las miembros es Miryan, quien hace comidas rápidas para la venta, ella misma se encarga de hacerlas y venderlas, y es asi que se gana la vida de una manera honesta y humilde. Su suelo es poder tener un local donde poder vender las comidas que hace. Esta agradecida por la ayuda que todas ellas hacen.
Pide este préstamo ya que quiere comprar insumos para seguir haciendo sus comidas, como ser carne, verduras, condimentos, hortalizas y demás.
texts.en:
La Victoria is a group made up of friends and neighbors from the city of San Lorenzo. They are in their tenth cycle of the women's committee program. They are participating in the poverty elimination survey. Through their effort and constant work, as well as applying their vital behavior, they are improving their situation of poverty.

One of the members of this group is Miryan, who makes fast food to sell. She makes and sells the food herself, earning a living in an honest and humble way. Her dream is to have a property where she can sell the food she makes. She is grateful for the help of the others.

She is applying for this loan to buy ingredients to continue making her meals, such as meat, vegetables, condiments, and more.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for making food such as meat, vegetables, condiments, and other products.

loans.name: Sara Yaneth

texts.es: Sara de 43 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hijo, ella tiene una pequeña tienda en la que vende productos perecederos como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, jabón, detergentes, aceite y otras serie de artículos comestibles y no comestibles; a través de  este comercio ha sacado adelante a su familia. Ella busca mejorar su calidad  de  vida,  por lo que solicita un crédito para incrementar la variedad de sus  artículos en su tienda y así le permitiría incrementar las ganancias de  su negocio y mejorar las condiciones de vida de su grupo familiar.
texts.en:
Sara, 43, lives in her own house with her husband and son. She has a small store where she sells perishable goods such as rice, beans, sugar, soap, detergent, oil, and other edible and non-edible products. Through this business, she has provided for her family.

She wishes to improve her quality of life, so she is applying for a loan to increase the variety of products in her store. This will allow her to increase her business earnings and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, sugar, soap, detergent, oil, etc.

loans.name: Sat

texts.en:
Sat is 39-years-old, and lives with her spouse and children in Trapeang Chhuk village, a rural area of Baray district, Kampong Thom province. Local people in this region work primarily in agriculture, commerce and livestock. As with other farmers, Sat seasonally grows rice and beans, which she sells in the markets after collecting the harvest. Sat has been in this occupation for more than 20 years and earns approximately KHR 30,000 per day.

She is now requesting a loan in order to to invest in buying seeds and renting the land for growing beans in this coming season. In this way she hopes to increase production and earn more income for her family. Through her hard work, perseverance and patience, she will be a successful entrepreneur in the future.

loans.use: to invest in buying seeds and renting the land for growing beans for this coming season.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more rice, fish, meat, onions, charcoal, pepper, oil, etc., for her cook shop.

loans.name: Renacer Group

texts.es:
El grupo RENACER  está en el segundo ciclo, son un grupo muy emprendedor y que fueron creciendo de a poco, así son todas las señoras muy emprendedoras y quieren avanzar más, por eso que siempre asisten a las capacitaciones.
Nancy, una integrante, tiene un depósito de maderas, donde a sus clientes ofrece variedades de maderas, para todo tipo de uso, gracias a que ella es una persona muy amable y con una actitud muy jovial fue creciendo poco a poco. Hoy su sueño es poder agrandar más su depósito, con lo cual podrá también dar trabajo a otras personas.
Pide este préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de maderas varias para que de esa forma pueda surtirse y cumplir con los pedidos de sus clientes.
texts.en: The group Renacer [New Beginning] is in it's second cycle. It is a very hard-working group and has grown little by little. All of the women are very hard-working and want to make progress. For this reason, they always attend training. Nancy, a member, has a lumber yard where she offers an assortment of wood for all sorts of uses to her customers. Thanks to her being a very friendly person and having a cheerful attitude, she has been growing steadily. Today her dream is to be able to expand her lumber yard, which would also give work to other people. She requests this loan in order to invest it in the purchase of various woods. In this way, she may stock up and fulfill her customers' orders.

loans.use: to buy wood for resale.

loans.name: Marcelino

texts.es: El señor Marcelino tiene 30 años de edad vive con su familia y tiene 2 dependientes. Sus principales actividades son la producción y venta de maíz que la realiza una vez al año, siembra en sus propios terrenos y a la vez se dedica a la cría de ganado vacuno y ovino. Trabaja arduamente para cubrir los gastos de alimentación, ropa, servicios básicos y otros en los que incurre su familia. Actualmente requiere un crédito para preparación de terreno agrícola, así podrá producir más cantidad de maíz y de esta manera lograra tener mayores ingresos con el fin de mejorar las condiciones de vida de toda su familia.
texts.en: Marcelino, 30, lives with his family and has two dependents. His main activities are producing and selling corn once per year. He plants the crops on his own land and also raises cows and sheep at the same time. He works hard to cover the expenses of food, clothing, basic services, and his family's other costs. He needs this loan to prepare his farmland. He will then be able to produce more corn and earn a higher income, with the goal of improving his entire family's living conditions.

loans.use: to prepare his farmland.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a small point soldering gun, a drill and materials to make his products.

loans.name: Felismina

texts.en:
Felismina is applying for a loan of $ 800.00 from TRM (Tuba Rai Metin). She is married and she is 31 years old. She is running a kiosk in front of her house and she will use the loan to buy inventory to keep in her store, including a refrigerator, noodles, cigarettes, coffee, sugar, salt, fish, fanta, coca-cola, sprite, sagiko, beer, water and body loosen. 

Felismina is making good money from selling and she wants to apply for a bigger loan in the future. Felismina lives in a town near the school. Her kiosk is located in a strategic place where many people come to buy items, including students.

loans.use: To buy a refrigerator, noodles, cigarettes, coffee, sugar, salt, fish, fanta, coca-cola, sprite, sagiko, beer, water and body loosen.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy hard drink (beer), soft drinks (fanta, coca-cola, sprite, sagiko ) noodles, cigarettes coffee, sugar, salt. eggs and water.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and a weighing scale

loans.name: Krull Zolin

texts.es: Krull está muy agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su apoyo podrá comprar madera y herramientas que le faltan para realizar su trabajo como operario de construcción, así el seguirá trabajando y luchando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en: Krull is very grateful for the Kiva lenders. Thanks to their help, he will be able to buy wood and tools which he needs to work as a construction worker. In this way, he will keep working and fighting to make his greatest dream come true: to have his own house.

loans.use: to buy wood and tools.

loans.name: Santa Marianita  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El grupo de crédito Santa Marianita está formado por 5 mujeres y 1 hombre quienes viven por la parroquia de Santa Ana en Cuenca, lugar de paisajes hermosos que desde su centro parroquial se admira la ciudad de Cuenca, su gente aún mantiene la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos. Las socias son personas amables, gentiles que siempre a pesar de sus problemas tienen una sonrisa en sus labios, son mujeres luchadoras que siempre están en la búsqueda de mejorar la estabilidad de su hogar y brindarles un mejor futuro a sus hijos.
Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Juana, tiene 35 años de edad, está casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 3 hijos de 13, 11 y 8 años de edad, su primera hija se encuentra en el colegio y sus dos hijos últimos hijos en la escuela, su esposo ha migrado para brindarle a su familia un mejor futuro, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven en casa de su mamá.
Doña Juana labora en la limpieza de casas y en su casa se dedica a la cría de cerdos, cuyes y gallinas, también se dedica a la agricultura. Estas actividades le dan la oportunidad de aportar a la economía de su hogar. 
El dinero de su crédito es para hacer un corral para pollos y comprar alimento para sus animales. Su meta es crecer en el negocio de pollos.
texts.en:
The Santa Marianita group is made up of five women and one man, who live in the city of Santa Ana in Cuenca, an area with beautiful scenery. One can admire the city of Cuenca from the center of their parish. The people still maintain the culture and traditions of their villages. The members are friendly, kind people who always have a smile on their face despite their problems. They are fighters who are always looking to improve the stability of their households and to give their children a better future.

One of the members of this group is Juana, 35. She is married with three children, ages 8, 11, and 13. Her oldest daughter is in high school and her two youngest are in elementary school. Her husband has emigrated to give the family a better future. They do not have their own home, so they live with her mother.

Juana cleans houses and raises pigs, guinea pigs, and chickens. She also works in agriculture. These activities give her the opportunity to contribute to her household finances.

She will use this loan to make a corral for chickens and to buy feed for her animals. Her goal is to grow her chicken business.

loans.use: to buy animal feed and make a corral for chickens.

loans.name: Andres

texts.es: Andres de 57 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y sus dos hijos los cuales ya son mayores de edad y trabajan. Andres trabaja como albañil desde hace 30 años, de esta forma ha llevado y sigue llevando el sustento a su hogar. Andres solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de una pila para reguardar el agua ya que no cuenta con una. Además, desea pintar las paredes de la vivienda. Con el monto solicitado comprará cemento, arena, grava, hierro y pintura.
texts.en:
Andres, 57, lives in his own house with his wife and two children, who are older and working. Andres has been working as a construction worker for 30 years, which is how he has sustained his household until the present day. 

He has applied for this loan from FUSAI to invest in the construction of a sink to hold water, since he does not currently have one. He would also like to paint the walls of his home. With the requested amount, he will buy cement, sand, gravel, iron and paint.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, gravel, iron, and paint to build a sink and paint the walls of his home.

loans.name: Carlos Darwin

texts.es: Carlos está muy agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias al apoyo que le han brindado el podrá comprar materiales para poder realizar mejoras en su vivienda y de esta manera poder mejorar su calidad de vida y sobre todo seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Estudiar una carrera universitaria”.
texts.en: Carlos is very grateful to Kiva lenders, because thanks to the support that they have provided he will be able to buy materials to make improvements to his home.  In this way he can improve his quality of life, and keep striving to make his great dream a reality:  to complete a university education.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Maria Angela

texts.es: María de 37 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus tres hijos de 17 años, 12 años y 2 años de edad. María trabaja como empleada doméstica en casa particular por lo que cada mes recibe un salario. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir  en la construcción de un cuarto ya que su casa es muy pequeña. Con el crédito comprará: lamina galvanizada, madera y clavos.
texts.en: María, 37, lives in her own house with her life partner and three children, ages 2, 12, and 17. She works as a domestic employee in a private house, for which she receives a monthly salary. She is applying for this loan from FUSAI to invest in the construction of a room, because her house is very small. With this loan, she will buy galvanized sheets, wood, and nails.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheets, wood, and nails to build a room.

loans.name: Monica

texts.en: Monica is applying for a loan of $1,000 to improve her business.  She runs a business in her house by selling body lotion, Fanta, eggs, soap and shampoo.  She makes a good income from her selling business and she wants to buy more stock with the loan.  She lives in a town near the main road, so many people come to buy and she sells every day. She opened her kiosk a year ago with her own working capital of $600.

loans.use: To buy body lotion, Fanta, eggs, soap and shampoo.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy items for her retail shop such as toothpaste and toys.

loans.name: Los Girasoles Del Algodonal Group

texts.es: El grupo “LOS GIRASOLES DEL ALGODONAL” está conformado  por 10  socios. Una de ellas es Vilma de 45 años casada con 5 hijos .Vilma vende toda clase de artículos de vestir  como ropa y calzado, empezó este negocio gracias a su hermana que se dedica a lo mismo. Durante los 15 años que se dedica a este trabajo ha podido ayudar a sus hijos con los estudios. Vilma desea seguir invirtiendo en su negocio para eso ha solicitado este préstamo ya que desea comprar ropa y zapatos que sus clientas le han solicitado por la temporada festiva hay mucha demanda de los artículos que vende, mas adelante desea abrir una tienda para poner su negocio ya que en la actualidad solo hace entregas a domicilio. Vilma junto a su grupo agradecen a los inversionistas por brindarles este crédito.en la foto es la única parada en la parte de atrás, viste polo floreado
texts.en:
The group "Los Girasoles del Algodonal" consists of 10 members. One of them is Vilma. She is 45 years old, married, and has five children. Vilma sells all types of clothing and shoes. She started her business thanks to her sister who is also in the same line of work. During the 15 years of working, Vilma has been able to help her children with their studies.

Vilma wants to continue investing in her business, so she is requesting a loan. She wants to buy clothing and shoes that her customers have requested during the festival season when there is more demand for the products she sells. Going forward she wants to open a shop where she can manage her business. At the moment, she only makes deliveries from her home.

Vilma and her group thank the Kiva lenders for providing this loan. In the photo, Vilma is sitting in the back and wearing a floral shirt.

loans.use: to buy clothing and shoes to sell.

loans.name: Madres Emprendedoras Group

texts.es: La Alcancía Comunal “Madres Emprendedoras” está conformada por 06 socios trabajadores. Graciela de 35 años es una de sus socias y la tesorera del grupo. Graciela es soltera es el único sustento de su hogar y su madre  que esta delicada de salud. Ella tiene una bodega donde vende diversos productos, también se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza, empezó este negocio hace 20 años, entre sus clientas están sus amistades, familiares y personas de su zona. Gracias a los ingresos que percibe por su trabajo tanto ella y su madre pueden vivir dignamente. Con el préstamo solicitado podrá adquirir productos navideños para su bodega de esa manera espera tener buenas ventas. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas por el crédito brindado en la foto Graciela viste casaca deportiva negra con rayas blancas.
texts.en: The "Madres Emprendedoras" communal bank is made up of 6 hard-working members.  Graciela is 35 years old and is the treasurer for the group.  Graciela is single and is the sole provide for her household, which includes her mother who is in poor health.  She has a small store where she sells a variety of products, and also sells beauty products.  She has been doing this for 20 years.  Her customers include her friends, family and people in her neighborhood.  Thanks to the income from her work she and her mother are able to live with dignity.  With the loan requested she will be able to buy Christmas products for her store, and expects to have good sales.  The group is grateful to lenders for the loan provided.  In the photo Graciela is wearing a black sports jacket with white stripes.

loans.use: to buy Christmas products.

loans.name: Mirian

texts.es:
La  Sra.  Mirian tiene 36 años, es  madre soltera y vive en la ciudad de Carapeguá. Esta señora empezó desde muy joven a trabajar como empleada doméstica y de a poco iba ahorrando su dinero para poder fabricar ella misma las tradicionales hamacas y sobrecamas que se venden en la zona ya que su madre se dedicaba a eso y así dejar de ser empleada ajena.
 Hoy día ya tiene clientela formada en la zona y así aumenta su pedido de productos, gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicación ya pudo construirse una pequeña casita. 
Solicita el préstamo para la compra de hilo, color y otros que son empleados en la elaboración de los productos artesanales y que en esta temporada le solicitan mucho sus clientes.
texts.en:
Mirian is 36 years old, a single mother, and lives in the city of Carapeguá. She started working from a young age as a domestic worker. She was gradually saving money in order to be able to make traditional hammocks and bedspreads that she sold in the locally as her mother worked in this field, and so she finished working in her original job.
Today she already has a client base in the area, helping to increase her product orders. Thanks to her effort and dedication she has been able to build a small house.
She is requesting a loan to buy yarn, dye and other items which are involved in the manufacture of craft products, since this season her customers' demands are greater.

loans.use: to buy yarn, dye and other items.

loans.name: Alberto

texts.es:
Alberto está estudiando una carrera que implica mucho sacrificio y responsabilidad, la cual es Derecho. El vive en el campo con una familia muy humilde.
Su meta es terminar la carrera de derecho y ejercer la profesión para poder tener una vida más digna y ayudar a su familia.
Actualmente está trabajando como docente, en una escuela en donde la gran mayoría de los alumnos son de escasos recursos.
Pide de este préstamo para poder invertirlo en el pago de sus cuotas y gastos de transporte, para poder cubrir esos gastos que son fijos y poder seguir estudiando.
texts.en:
Alberto is studying a career in law which requires much sacrifice and responsibility. He lives in the countryside with his very humble family. His goal is to complete his studies in law and exercise his profession in order to have a more dignified life and help his family.
Today he is working as a teacher in a school where the majority of students are poor.
He is requesting this loan to invest to pay for fees and transportation costs to be able to cover those expenses that are fixed so he can continue studying.

loans.use: to pay fees and transportation costs.

loans.name: Ramon Antonio

texts.es: Ramón de 49 años de edad es un hombre muy responsable con sus obligaciones de hogar, ya que siempre se ha caracterizado por brindarle lo mejor a su familia. Actualmente vive junto a su esposa y sus dos hijos, el es muy trabajador, siempre lo ha realizado con alegría y entusiasmo, se dedica a ser agricultora siembra todos los años los principales granos básicos de la zona como lo son: maíz y frijol también cultiva caña de azúcar,  Ramón  desea incrementar sus ventas y por eso visitó las oficinas de INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito el cual le permita comprar: semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas entre otros. Desea contar con la ayuda solicitada puesto que no tiene otros ingresos monetarios, y así el seguirá llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
Ramón is a 49-year-old man who is very responsible with his household obligations. He is always known for providing the best for his family. Ramón currently lives with his wife and two children. He is very a hard worker who is always cheerful and enthusiastic. Ramón is a farmer who every year always grows basic staples of the area, such as corn and beans. He also cultivates sugar cane.

Ramón wants to increase his sales, so he visited the offices of Apoyo Integral in order to request a loan for buying seeds, compost, fertilizers, pesticides, and other supplies. He would like to have the help he requested since he has no other sources of income. This will enable him to provide for his household needs without any limitations.

loans.use: to buy seeds, compost, fertilizers, pesticides, and other supplies.

loans.name: Madres Ladereñas Group

texts.es: El Grupo “MADRES LADEREÑAS” está conformado por 07 socios todos dedicados a diferentes a diversas actividades comerciales. Eliza es una de las socias ella tiene 64 años es viuda y vive con sus 4 hijos todos independientes. Eliza tiene su negocio especerías en su casa allí vende toda clase de condimentos y aderezos  sus clientas son sus vecinas y moradores del lugar, por  las tardes se dedica a la venta de comidas ofreciendo diferentes potajes diariamente vende aproximadamente 30 porciones. El.iza es una mujer muy trabajadora y le hace feliz poder generar sus propios ingresos y ayudar a su familia. Con el préstamo solicitado podrá arreglar parte de su cocina y otra parte para invertir en su negocio de especerías, el sueño de Eliza es abrir un restaurante agradece a Edaprospo y a Kiva por esta gran ayuda para ella y su grupo comunal.en la foto es la primera de la izquierda viste blusa floreada, la foto adjunta pertenece al Sr. Humberto.
texts.en: The "MADRES LADERENAS" group is made up of 7 members who all work at different businesses.  Eliza is one of the members.  She is 64 years old, is a widow, and lives with her four children, all of whom are independent.  Eliza has a spice business in her house, and sells all kinds of condiments and dressings.  Her customers are her neighbors and local residents.  In the evenings she sells meals, offering different dishes every day and selling about 30 servings.  Eliza is a very hard-working woman, and it makes her happy to be able to earn her own income and help her family.   With the loan requested she will be able to fix up part of her kitchen, and also to invest in her spice business.  Her dream is to open a restaurant.  She is grateful to Edaprospo and to Kiva for this great help for her and her group.  In the photo she is the first on the left wearing a floral blouse.  The person in the adjoining photo is Humberto.

loans.use: to invest in her spice business.

loans.name: Villa Universitaria Group

texts.es: La alcancía “VILLA UNIVERSITARIA” está conformada por 06 socios. Alexandra  una de sus  integrantes tiene 53 años es casada con 3 hijos mayores de edad, ella se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza; trabajar en su  negocio le permite  tener ingresos para solventar gastos familiares. Alexandra quiere seguir en este negocio y le gustaría tener un lugar estable para exhibir sus productos. El crédito que solicitó lo destinará para la compra de perfumes, cremas y maquillaje. Con esta compra espera cumplir con sus clientas  que siempre le solicitan productos. Alexandra esta agradecida por este préstamo para su grupo, especialmente a los inversionistas de todo el mundo, en la foto es la quinta de la izquierda viste polo negro y pantalon plomo.
texts.en: The communal bank “Villa Universitaria” is made up of 6 members. Alexandra is one of the members. She’s 53 years old, married, and has three grown children. She sells beauty products. This work allows her income to meet household expenses. Alexandra would like to continue with this business, and she’d like a more stable location from which to display her products. The loan she’s asking for is to buy perfumes, lotions, and makeup. With this purchase she hopes to satisfy her customers who always order from her. Alexandra is thankful for the loan from the group and especially from all the lenders around the world. In the photo she’s 5th from the left in the black shirt and the gray pants.

loans.use: to buy beauty products.

loans.name: De La Mano Con Jesus Group

texts.es: Juan de 55 años es casado  y tiene  hijos mayores de edad, el es integrante del grupo “DE LA MANO CON JESUS” conformada por 06 socios trabajadores. Juan se dedica al comercio tiene una fuente de soda donde vende jugos, pasteles y sándwiches. El crédito solicitado lo invertirá en la compra de mobiliario para su local donde le hacen falta más mesas y sillas.. El mayor deseo de Juan es seguir creciendo para obtener mejores ganancias. El grupo está  agradecido a los inversionistas por el crédito brindado.
texts.en: Juan, aged 55, is married with grown children. He is a member of the "De la Mano con Jesus" (Hand in Hand with Jesus) group, made up of 6 working members. Juan works selling juices, pastries and sandwiches. The requested loan will be invested in buying furniture for his business which needs more tables and chairs. Juan's greatest desire is to keep growing his business in order to increase profits. The group is grateful to the lenders for the loan given.

loans.use: to buy tables and chairs

loans.name: Chan

texts.en:
Chan is 32-years-old and lives in the village of Baray, which is in the Kampong Thom province. She is married and has two school-going children. She and her husband have been engaged in agriculture, farming rice and raising pigs.  In the same manner, Chan has taught her children to work in farming besides their class, as she learned from her parents when she was a young girl.

Chan has requested her first loan to buy 5 bags of feed for fattening 10 head of pigs, which she will sell to local butchers and markets when they mature. With the loan support, she hopes to earn a good profit so that she can meet the needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy 5 bags of feed for fattening 10 head of pigs.

loans.name: 3.09.808.14 Thiệu Dương Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Hiểu works in agriculture farming poultry and cattle. She is requesting a loan to purchase cattle feed to resell.

Hiểu is 51-years-old and she is married with one child.  Hiểu is the group leader of the 3.09.808.14 Thiệu Dương solidarity group, which consists of five members.  She lives and works in the Thieu Hoa district, a rural area in the Thanh Hoa province, with one dependent.

In 2010, Hiểu joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Hiểu has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.  Hiểu has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.  The main harship that Hiểu faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Hiểu hopes for her business to do well and to maintain a successful business.

loans.use: to purchase cattle feed to resell.

loans.name: 04.01.03 Đông Sơn Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Bảy has a retail business selling general things. She is requesting a loan to purchase general things such as milk, candy, and dry food to resell.

Bảy is 44 years old and she is married with 2 children. She is the group leader of the 04.10.03 Đông Sơn solidarity group, which consists of 6 members. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, a urban area in Thanh Hoa province, with 2 dependents

In 2012, Bảy joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Bảy has successfully repaid 2 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. She has been involved in this business for 5 years. The main harship that Bảy faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Bảy hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to find a good job.

loans.use: to purchase generals things such as milk, candy, and dry food to resell.

loans.name: Pheap

texts.en:
Pheap is a 51-year-old widowed mother from a rural area of Baray district, where rice farming is a common business for local people. Pheap, being a responsible mother, has tried to raise her family of seven children alone by growing rice and other seasonal crops. The current business earns her about KHR 20,000 per day. Her children help her with her every day farming work.

To help her further develop her farming business, Pheap is asking for a loan in the sum of KHR 1,000,000 to add to her own capital to buy a plot of land for farming.  This way, she can increase her rice production and earn more income to meet the needs of her living.

loans.use: to buy a plot of land for farming.

loans.name: Oñondivepa Group

texts.es:
El grupo Oñondivepa está en su ciclo número cuatro del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, para poder conocer en qué situación está cada una.
Delfina comenta que por medio de la venta de joyas está saliendo adelante, al principio le fue un poco difícil, pero después, poco a poco fue ganando experiencia y ya se hizo de muy buena clientela. Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de joyas varias para poder seguir con sus ventas.
texts.en: The Onondivepa group is in its fourth loan cycle with the women's committee program.  All of them work and help each other to get ahead.  They are conducting a survey to eliminate poverty, in order to know what situation everyone is in.  Delfina says that she is getting ahead through her jewelry sales; at first it was a bit difficult, but later she gained experience bit by bit and she has now developed a good clientele.  She is requesting this loan to invest in buying a variety of jewelry, in order to continue with her sales.

loans.use: to buy a variety of jewelry to sell

loans.name: Saturnino

texts.es: Saturnino de 59 años de edad, vive con sus dos hijos de 19 y 15 años de edad en casa propia, Don Saturnino es un hombre  trabajador, responsable y muy emprendedor desde hace 4 años se dedica a la crianza de ganado de repasto, adicional a eso también se dedica a la  producción y venta de productos lácteos en la zona donde reside. Tiene muy buena clientela ya que ha sabido ganarse la confianza de sus clientes. Ofrece calidad y buenos precios en sus productos, ha decidido invertir en el cuidado de sus ganados ya que de eso depende su negocio. Por eso ha solicitado un crédito para poder comprar vitaminas para el ganado y ajustar para la compra de una vaca lechera que le permita crecer en el negocio. Con esto espera obtener resultados favorables y continuar brindando la ayuda económica a su hogar que tanto lo necesita.
texts.en: Saturnino is 59 years old. He lives in his own house with his two children, ages 15 and 19. Don Saturnino is hardworking, responsible and entrepreneurial. For 4 years he has made a living through raising livestock for grazing. In addition to this he also produces and sells dairy products in the zone where he lives. He has a very good customer base since he has known to earn the trust of his customers. He offers quality and good prices in his products. He has decided to invest in the care of his livestock considering that his business depends on them. Therefore, he has requested a loan so that he may buy vitamins for the livestock and settle the purchase of a dairy cow that allows him to grow in his business. With this he hopes to get favorable results and continue to give the economic assistance to his household that needs it so much.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: 12-07-03 Quảng Tâm Group

texts.en:
Ms.Thu operates a food stall/restaurant selling meat. She is requesting a loan to purchase pork to resell.

Thu is 51-years-old and she is single with two children.  Thu is the group leader of the 12-07-03 Quảng Tâm solidarity group, which consists of three members.  Thu supports one dependent with her business in Thanh Hoa city, an urban town in Thanh Hoa province.  The other child is grown up.

This is Thu's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.  Thu has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.  One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Thu hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her children to find a good job, and to remodel her house.

loans.use: to purchase pork to resell.

loans.name: 02.07.07Đông Hải Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Hà has a retail business selling clothes. She is requesting a loan to purchase clothes to resell.

Hà is 30-years-old and she is married with three children.  Hà is the group leader of the 02.07.07 Đông Hải solidarity group, which consists of four members. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province, with three dependents.

This is Hà's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.  Hà has been involved in this business for five years.  One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Hà hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase clothes to resell

loans.name: 01.07.06 Đông Hải Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Khuê operates a food stall/restaurant selling fruit. She is requesting a loan to purchase fruit to resell.

Khuê is 37-years-old and she is married with two children.  Khuê is the group leader of the 02.07.06 Đông Hải solidarity group, which consists of four members.  She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province, with two dependents.

This is Khuê's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.  Khuê has been involved in this business for five years.  The main hardship that Khuê faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Khuê hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase fruit to resell

loans.name: 01.01.02 Đông Sơn Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Luyên has a service business tailoring clothes. She is requesting a loan to purchase a sewing machine to repair clothes.

Luyên is 46-years-old and she is married with one child.  Luyên is the group leader of the 01.01.02 Đông Sơn solidarity group, which consists of four members.  She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province, with one dependent.

This is Luyên's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.  Luyên has been involved in this business for seven years.  One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Luyên hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine to repair clothes.

loans.name: Tania Noemi

texts.es: Es una joven con iniciativa, amable, es casada, tiene dos hijos en edad escolar. Desde hace dos y medio estableció su pulpería, con un préstamo que obtuvo en una microfinanciera local, sin embargo, por los beneficios que brinda PANA PANA, solicita su tercer financiamiento para comprar mercadería para su negocio: Un quintal de frijoles, 5 quintales de arroz, 3 bidones de aceite, un quintal de azúcar, dos docenas de leche en polvo y de sopas instantáneas, dos bolsones de detergentes, 2 cajas de jabones de lavar ropa, 4 bolsones de pastes para lavar trastes, chiverías, 2 docenas de jabones de baño, y comprar nuevos productos para establecer en una vitrina productos de belleza y accesorios. Su sueño es ampliar su negocio y apoyar a su familia.
texts.en: Tania is a young and friendly woman with initiative. She is married with two school-age children. Two and a half years ago she established her grocery store with a loan that she received from a local microfinance institution. However, through Pana Pana, she is requesting her third loan cycle in order to buy merchandise for her business: a quintal of beans, five quintals of rice, three drums of oil, a quintal of sugar, two dozen packs of powdered milk and instant soup, two packets of detergent, two boxes of laundry soap, four packets of dishwashing paste, dairy products, two dozen bath soaps, and to buy new products to establish a window display of beauty products and accessories. Her dream is to expand her business and to support her family.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her business

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is 21 years old, and he lives with his family in Gaza. He has been selling clothes since 2012. He works hard to support his family to provide good living conditions.

Ahmad asked Ryada for this youth loan to buy stock for selling all kinds of clothes. This will increase the numbers of clients and will increase his income, which will help him to improve the financial conditions for his family.  

Ahmad is very grateful to everyone who helps him to achieve success in his business with this loan.

loans.use: to buy stocks of clothes to sell.

loans.name: Santa Rosa De Lima Group

texts.es: Felicitas es integrante del grupo “Santa Rosa” sus  07 socios son trabajadores de diferentes comercios. Felicitas tiene 42 años, en la actualidad vive con su pareja y sus 2 hijos quienes la motivan a seguir trabajando, hace 5 años empezó su negocio de venta de pollo trabajo que realiza diariamente, con mucho sacrificio ha podido comprarse un puesto de venta donde realiza sus ventas. El préstamo solicitado le servirá para la compra de pollos  al por mayor, más adelante le gustaría comprarse otro puesto y así agrandar su negocio. El grupo por medio de ella quiere agradecer a a las personas que hicieron posible éste crédito. En la foto es la 6ta de la izquierda viste blusa floreada.
texts.en: Felicitas is a member of the "Santa Rosa" group, whose 7 members work in different business.  Felicitas is 42 years old and lives with her partner and two children, who are motivating her to continue working. Five years ago she started a business selling chicken.  She works every day, and with great sacrifice has been able to buy a market stall where she sells her products.  The loan requested will be used to buy wholesale chickens.  Later she would like to buy another stall and thus expand her business.  On behalf of the group she would like to thank the people who made this loan possible.  In the photo she is the sixth person from the left, wearing a floral blouse.

loans.use: to buy chickens.

loans.name: Virgen De Las Gracias Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Virgen de las Gracias con su trabajo y esfuerzo conjunto está mejorando cada vez más, es un grupo que se destaca por su unión, ya que todas son mujeres muy luchadoras y madres. Están dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, con el cual quieren ir mejorando cada día.
Amelia es una persona que se destaca por el gran esfuerzo que está haciendo, siempre participa de manera activa en las capacitaciones. Se dedica a la peluquería, haciendo un excelente trabajo con el que sus clientes siempre están conformes. Su sueño es poder dar fuente de trabajo a otras personas que al igual que ella quieren ser alguien en la vida.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de tintes, shampoo, enjuagues, tijeras y demás insumos para poder seguir trabajando y dando a sus clientes el buen servicio que siempre han recibido.
texts.en:
The group called "Virgen de las Gracias" (Our Lady of Grace) with its work and joint effort is improving more and more. It is a group that stands out as a result of its unity, as all of its female members are true fighters and mothers. They are in the programme that aims to eliminate poverty, through which they wish to improve themselves each day.
Amelia is a person who stands out as a result of her continuing great efforts, always actively involved in the training. She works as a hairdresser, doing an excellent job with which her clients are always happy. Her dream is to be able to give work to other people like her who want to be someone in life.
The loan has been requested in order to buy dyes, shampoo, rinses, scissors and other supplies in order to keep working and give their customers the good service that they have always received.

loans.use: to buy dyes, shampoo, rinses, scissors and other supplies

loans.name: Fanny

texts.es:
Fanny es estudiante de la carrera de Administración de empresas, está en el tercer Año, y cuenta que su objetivo y meta es culminar sus estudios y trabajar en una empresa donde pueda ejercer su carrera. 
Su aspiración es ser el sustento de su familia ganarse el pan de cada día con el fruto de su esfuerzo. Su familia es su principal apoyo, que siempre han estado al lado de ella, dándole su mano para lo que necesitase.
Fanny pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en el pago de sus cuotas, como también para cubrir sus gastos de transporte, ya que son gastos que siempre tiene y quiere poder cubrirlos, además agradece por esta oportunidad de seguir estudiando que recibe a través del préstamo.
texts.en:
Fanny is a Business Administration student in her third year and her objective and goal is to finish her studies and work in a business where she can exercise all that she has learnt.
Her aspiration is to be the supporting breadwinner of her family with the fruit of her efforts. Her family is her main support, having always stood by her, giving her a hand whenever it was needed.
Fanny asks for this loan in order to pay for her fees, as well as covering her transportation costs, since there are always expenses that she needs to cover. As a result of this loan, she is grateful for the opportunity to keep studying.

loans.use: to pay for fees and transportation costs.

loans.name: Nelly

texts.es: La señora Nelly es una mujer emprendedora, madre y cariñosa abuelita, desde muy joven tuvo la inclinación por los peinados y cortes de cabello, por lo que quiso aprender el oficio, hoy después de más de 20 años en el rubro, es una excelente profesional. Actualmente tiene una peluquería pequeña en su domicilio. Sus hijos se independizaron y ahora ella es el principal sustento de su hogar,  por lo que solicita un crédito para  equipar su salón y comprar insumos y material para peluqueria con el fin de ofrecer un mejor servicio, además desea enseñar a otras personas, y así generar fuentes de trabajo.
texts.en: The lady Nelly is a hardworking woman. She is a mother and caring grandmother. Since she was very young, she had an aptitude for hairstyles and haircuts. Because of this she wanted to learn the trade. Today, after more than 20 years in the field, she is an excellent professional. Presently, she has a small hair salon in her home. Her children are independent and now she is the primary supporter of her household. Because of this she requests a loan in order to outfit her salon and buy supplies and equipment for hairstyling. Her aim is to offer better service. Furthermore, she wishes to teach other people and in this way create sources of work.

loans.use: to buy supplies and equipment for hairdressing.

loans.name: Thompson

texts.es: Es originario de Puerto Cabezas, tiene 58 años de edad, casado con 6 hijos, de los cuales 4 son mayores de edad y dos menores de 3 y 4 años respectivamente. Desde hace 10 años estableció una pulpería en su vivienda, con el propósito de tener su propia fuente de ingresos. Actualmente solicita financiamiento para comprar más mercadería para su negocio: 12 bolsones de chivería, un bolsón de papel higiénico, toallas sanitarias, sopas instantáneas, granos básicos, café instantáneo, jabones de baño y de lavar ropa. Su sueño es ir creciendo y en fututo establecer una miscelánea.
texts.en: Native of Puerto Cabezas, Thompson is 58 years old and married with 6 children, of which four are adults and two are 3 and 4 years old, respectively. Ten years ago he established a convenience store in his home with the purpose of having his own source of income. Currently he is seeking a loan in order to buy merchandise for his business: 12 Chivería bags, a bag of toilet paper, sanitary napkins, instant soups, bulk grains, instant coffee and soaps for bathing and washing clothes. His dream is to start growing and in the future establish a corner shop.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for his business: 12 Chivería bags, a bag of toilet paper, sanitary napkins, instant soups, bulk grains, instant coffee and soaps for baths and washing clothes.

loans.name: Gloria Del Carmen

texts.es:
Gloria, una madre y abuela ejemplar, se ha dedicado por muchos años a buscar la manera de sustentar las necesidades básicas de su familia, pues su esposo la abandonó después de 30 años de matrimonio y la dejó con la carga económica del hogar, con los gastos de sus 4 hijos y 5 nietos; su principal fuente de ingresos es la producción y venta de tamales y morcilla que fabrica de manera artesanal y cocina en fogón de leña, estos productos los vende por encargos y cuenta con el apoyo de una hija; esto le ha permitido salir adelante con su familia.
Con el ánimo de mejorar las condiciones de trabajo, solicita el apoyo del crédito para comprar un quemador a gas, una batería de ollas grandes y utensilios de cocina; esto le permitirá trabajar con mayor comodidad y además optimizará el tiempo de producción, generando la oportunidad de adquirir contratos más grandes y así poder cumplir el sueño de consolidar su negocio.
Para lograr su propósito, Gloria es consciente que debe seguir luchando con mucha perseverancia, tenacidad y empeño, pues así tendrá la capacidad de brindar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y bienestar.
texts.en:
Gloria is an exemplary mother and grandmother and has worked for many years to find ways of supporting the basic needs of her family, because her husband left her after 30 years of marriage and left her with the financial burden of the household, with the costs of her four children and five grandchildren. Her main source of income is the production and sale of tamales and sausage that she makes in a homemade style cooked on a wooden stove. These are sold to order and she counts on the help of a daughter. This has allowed her to cope with her family.
With the aim of improving her working conditions, she is requesting the support of a loan in order to buy a gas stove, a variety of large pots and cooking utensils. This will allow her to work more comfortably and also to optimize production time, creating the opportunity to receive larger orders so that she can fulfill the dream of consolidating her business. To achieve these aims, Gloria is aware that she must keep struggling with great perseverance, tenacity and commitment. And so, she will have the ability to offer her family a better quality of life and well-being.

loans.use: to buy a gas stove, a variety of large pots and cooking utensils.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy some containers and other washing machines

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothes and cosmetics

loans.name: Al Amal 6 Group

texts.en:
Raeifa is the featured borrower of Al Amal 6 group. She got together with the other group members to acquire a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua because they have always been neighbors and friends. 

Raeifa is a 61-year-old married mother of three. She has had her own bakery for the last ten years. She specializes in Saj bread, a special traditional Lebanese baked bread highly requested in her region.

Her acquired loan will be invested in increasing her business merchandise with necessary flour, thyme, cheese and oils to increase her business production.

She hopes to keep on developing her business and increasing her production to reply to the wider market requesting her production.

She is the lady on the right side of the picture. The other group members are Maha, the lady in red, and Jana, the lady at the center.

loans.use: To buy more ingredients for her bakery

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more coal, soap, red oil, rice, pepper, salt, maggi cube, and vegetable oil for the business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more pepper, oil, onion, vita, rice etc to increase her sales.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cleaning equipment

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more palm oil for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and a weighing scale

loans.name: Vanessa Beatriz

texts.es:
En provincia de Manabí encontramos el cantón 24 De Mayo, aquí se reúne el Grupo De Crédito Nuevos Horizontes De 24 de Mayo, es conocido por sus paisajes hermosos y por su gente trabajadora dedicada a la agricultura y cría de animales. 
En este lugar vive la señora Vanessa, tiene 26 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen dos hijos de  9 y 3 años  de edad, la mayor estudia en escuela. Su esposo es policía.
Doña Vanessa es una ama de casa que le gusta ganar lo suyo para no depender de lo que su marido, para esto ella se dedica al comercio, vende ropa por catalogo y productos de Avon y Yanbal (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas). Trabaja tres días a la semana de dos a tres horas al día en la mañana ya que a esa hora solo tiene que llevar a su hijo más pequeño ya que la mayor está en la escuela, ella deja sus productos a crédito y cobra cada ocho días. Tiene 4 años que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien.
Este crédito es para comprar ropa, perfumes, cremas, cosméticos y bisuterías. Este es el tercer ciclo en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los pagos son fáciles de hacer. Su sueño es tener una boutique.
texts.en:
The credit group Nuevos Horizontes de 24 de Mayo meet in a small area of the same name, in the province of Manabi.  This place is well-known for its beautiful countryside and hard-working people, who work in agriculture and the raising of animals.

This is where Vanessa, 26, lives with her husband and two children aged 9 and 3.  Her eldest child is at school.  Her husband is a police officer.

Vanessa is a housewife who likes to earn her own income so as not to have to depend on her husband.  Therefore she has a business selling clothes by catalogue and products by Avon and Yanbal (beauty products, cosmetics, perfume and women’s accessories).  She works three days a week, for about two to three hours a day in the morning.  She can work at this time because her eldest child is at school and she only has to look after the youngest.  She sells her products on credit and collects payment every eight days.  She has been doing this for four years and she has been successful.

This loan is to buy clothes, perfume, cream, cosmetics and costume jewelry.  This is her third cycle in the credit group and she likes it because it is easy to pay off the money.  She dreams of having her own boutique.

loans.use: to buy clothes, perfume, cream, cosmetics and costume jewelry.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tomatoes and fruits

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more pepper, bitter ball, salt and other items for her business.

loans.name: Libia Amparo

texts.es:
Libia es una mujer luchadora y amable, madre soltera de un hijo al que ha sacado adelante con gran esfuerzo y dedicación. Desde muy joven aprendió el arte de la confección de una manera empírica y desde hace muchos años montó su propio taller ubicado en un espacio de su casa; actualmente presta el servicio de confección a terceros y, de manera alterna también tiene una pequeña miscelánea, en la que vende todo tipo de mercancía; esto le genera un ingreso adicional para solventar los gastos familiares, especialmente con lo relacionado al delicado estado de salud que enfrenta su madre.
El crédito es solicitado como apoyo para comprar insumos al por mayor (telas, hilos, botones, encajes, entre otros), con los que podrá cumplir su sueño de confeccionar la línea propia y además podrá cumplir con los contratos que tiene pendientes. De esta manera, Libia desea seguir luchando para sacar adelante su oficio y sus negocios, garantizando una mejor  calidad de vida para su familia.
texts.en:
Libia is a hard-working and friendly woman.  She is the single mother of one child who she has dedicated a lot of time and effort to bringing up.  When she was very young, she learnt by experience the trade of tailoring and a long time ago she set up her own workshop for producing for third parties.  At the same time, she also has a small general store in which she sells all types of goods.  This provides her with an extra income which allows her to take care of family expenses, especially those related to the ill health of her mother.

The loan is to buy supplies wholesale (cloth, thread, buttons and lace among other things), which she can use to fulfill her dream of producing her own line and meet existing contracts that she has pending.  In this way, Libia intends to keep working hard to develop her business and her trade, which will guarantee a better standard of living for her family.

loans.use: to buy wholesale supplies (cloth, thread, buttons and lace, among other things)

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and a weighing scale

loans.name: Monserrate Guadalupe

texts.es:
En provincia de Manabí encontramos el cantón 24 De Mayo, aquí se reúne el Grupo De Crédito Nuevos Horizontes De 24 de Mayo, es conocido por sus paisajes hermosos y por su gente trabajadora dedicada a la agricultura y cría de animales. 
En este lugar vive la señora Monserrate, tiene 38 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen 4 hijos de 22, 19, 16 y 12 años, los dos menores estudian en colegio. Su esposo es panadero.
Doña Monserrate junto a su familia tienen una panadería en la ciudad, allí además de preparar y vender pan de varias clases también venden víveres,  trabajan todos los días desde las 5h00 hasta las 20h00 y a veces hasta más tarde ya que ellos en la noche preparan la masa del pan que al otro día hornean, así el pan está listo cuando sus clientes llegan hasta su local, sus hijos trabajan con ellos ya que este es un negocio familiar. Ellos tienen mas de 20 años que se dedican a esta actividad con lo cual salen adelante.
Este crédito es para comprar harina, huevos, mantequilla, azúcar y otros ingredientes  para preparar el pan así como víveres para la venta. Está desde el inicio en el Grupo De Crédito  y le gusta porque con los créditos cada vez mejora más su negocio. Sus metas son seguir adelante en su negocio y que su negocio crezca cada día más.
texts.en:
In the Manabi province we find the 24 De Mayo canton (May 24th canton); here is where the Credit Group Nuevos Horizontes De 24 De Mayo (New Horizons of May 24th) meets. It is known for its beautiful landscapes and its hardworking people, dedicated to agriculture and raising animals. Monserrate lives here. She is 38 years old, married, and from this relationship has four children, ages 22,19,16, and 12. The two youngest are students in school. Her husband is a baker. 

Monserrate, together with her family, has a bakery in the city. There, on top of baking and selling different types of bread, they also sell food supplies.
