They work every day from 5:00 a.m. until 8:00 p.m., and sometimes until later since they prepare the dough at night to be baked the next day. This way the bread is ready when the customers come to their shop. Their children work with them since this is a family business. They have more than 20 years of experience in this line of work which helps them to be successful. 

This loan is to buy flour, eggs, butter, sugar, and other ingredients to make bread, as well as food supplies to sell. Monserrate is in the Credit Group since the beginning and she likes it because the loans help her business every time. Her goals are to continue forward with her business and for it to grow more every day.

loans.use: to buy food supplies, flour, eggs, butter, sugar, and other ingredients for making bread.

loans.name: Zviad

texts.en:
Zviad is a 31-year-old young man, who lives in Kutaisi, west Georgia.  He lives with his wife, school-aged son and mother-in-law.  His mother-in-law is a housekeeper but his family's primary source of income is his wife's work serving clients as a manicurist at a salon.  However, a four-member family cannot live only under this insignificant salary.  

Zviad decided to contribute to the welfare of the family and start his own activity.  He sold his second flat in order to buy a mini-bus for serving clients as a driver and to generate some income to increase his family's standard of living.
 
Zviad applied for a loan through MFO Credo, and was approved under the framework of a start-up program.  This program is a joint initiative with Kiva that permits the rural poor to start or re-start businesses.  A loan of $2,000 will help him to pay the mini-bus toll and then start a mini-bus line service.  Zviad hopes to offer his family a higher quality of life and a more stable financial future.

loans.use: to pay the mini-bus toll and start a mini-bus line service

loans.name: Ana Melitza

texts.es:
Ana es una señora soltera de 28 años de edad, vive junto a sus 2 hijos de los cuales son, un hombre y una mujer,  ambos menores de edad quienes viven  en el Departamento de Sololá.
Ella es una señora trabajadora que ha podido sacar adelante a su familia. Actualmente cuenta con dos taxis, para servicio de transporte para la población de su comunidad. Comenta que esta actividad es bastante productiva en cuanto a la generación de ingresos y ganancias ya que en su comunidad no hay taxis. Como también comenta que elabora bordados a mano para poder contar con otro ingreso, esto lo realiza con el fin de mejorar la economía de su familia.
Ella ha tomado la iniciativa de tener un negocio, es por ello que está solicitando un préstamo de Q 7,000.00 para la compra de un molino de nixtamal eléctrico (sirve para moler el maíz), porque en su comunidad hay pocos y existe una fuerte demanda. El préstamo lo pagara con el trabajo que actualmente cuenta.
Su sueño es construir su vivienda a través de la labor que realiza, ya que desea que su familia viva en mejores condiciones.
texts.en:
Ana, 28, is a single woman who lives with her two underage children, one son and one daughter, in Solola.

She is a hard-working woman who has been able to provide for her family.  At the moment, she has two taxis for a transport service in her community.  She tells us that this is earns her quite a steady income because there aren’t any taxis in her area.  She also creates her own embroidery designs to provide her with another income, all of which help her to look after her family.

She has taken the initiative to start another business and for this, she is asking for a loan of 7,000 quetzals to buy an electric wet corn (nixtamal) grinder, because in her area there are very few and there is a great demand.  She will pay off the loan with the work she has at the moment.

Her dream is to build a house with the income she generates from the work she does, as she would like her family to live in better conditions.

loans.use: to buy an electric wet corn grinder.

loans.name: María Oberis

texts.es:
María es una mujer de 35 años de edad que ha pasado por muchas dificultades tras la separación con su esposo, entró en una crisis tanto emocional, como económica en la que su padres fueron el único apoyo para ella y su pequeña hija. Con el ánimo de generar ingresos para aportar a la economía del hogar, ella desea iniciar su propio negocio de helados para el cual ya posee local, pues tiene amplio conocimiento y experiencia porque tenía un negocio similar en sociedad con su esposo, pero tras la separación éste se tuvo que cerrar, quedando en la ruina, lo que la obligó a vender los pocos enseres que poseía para saldar las deudas del mismo. Esto la lleva a solicitar el apoyo del crédito con el que comprará utensilios de cocina (copas, cucharas, vasos desechables, entre otros), así podrá dar inicio a su nuevo proyecto productivo del cual espera tener buenos resultados y comenzar a ser reconocido en el sector tanto por la calidad de sus productos, como por el excelente servicio que se prestará.
María tiene como propósito, hacer de su negocio un establecimiento agradable, en el que se pueda compartir en familia o con los amigos y disfrutar de un buen momento; así podrá lograr el éxito que requiere para continuar solventando las necesidades de su hogar y brindar mejor calidad de vida a su hija.
texts.en:
María, 35, has overcome many hard times since she separated from her husband.  She suffered an emotional and financial crisis, and her parents were the only support for her and her young daughter.  

To generate an income and contribute to the household expenses she decided to set up her own ice-cream shop in a property she owns.  She has got a lot of knowledge and experience in this area because she had a similar business with her husband.  However, after they separated, they had to close it, which left her bankrupt, forcing her to sell the few possessions that she had in order to pay off the debts.
  
This has led her to request this loan, which she will use to buy kitchen utensils (glasses, spoons, disposable glasses and other things), which will help her to start her new project.  She hopes to be successful and become well-known in the sector both for the quality of her products and the excellent service she offers.

Her aim is to make her business a nice place, which she can share with her friends and family to celebrate good times.  This way, she can achieve the success that will allow her to keep meeting household needs and offer her daughter a better standard of living.

loans.use: to buy cooking utensils (glasses, spoons, disposable glasses and others)

loans.name: Leidiana Patricia

texts.es:
Leidiana es una mujer casada de 40 años de edad y madre de dos hijos a los que ha sacado adelante con gran esfuerzo.
Durante su vida productiva ha trabajado como operaria en diferentes talleres de confección, donde aprendió todo sobre el manejo del negocio; esto la impulsó a independizarse y montar su propio taller desde hace un año, en el que presta el servicio de confección a terceros y fabricación de prendas de línea propia; trabaja sola todos los días y así genera los ingresos para apoyar a su esposo con la carga económica del hogar.
El crédito lo requiere para comprar insumos al por mayor (telas, hilos, botones, elásticos, entre otros), esto le permitirá tener material suficiente para culminar los trabajos que tiene pendientes y para aumentar su producción de línea propia para vender en la temporada decembrina; así logrará recaudar dinero para el sustento familiar.
Leidiana tiene como propósito fortalecer su negocio y en un futuro, sacar su línea propia de blusas para generar mayor impacto en el mercado, mejor rentabilidad y que le permita generar oportunidades de empleo; así mejorará no sólo la calidad de vida de su familia, sino también la de las demás personas que ayuden en su labor.
texts.en:
Leidiana, 40, is married and has two children who she has worked hard to raise.

During her working life she has been a machinist in different tailoring workshops where she learnt all about managing a business.  This spurred her to become independent and set up her own workshop a year ago, where she offers a tailoring service to third parties and makes her own line of clothes.  She works alone every day and generates an income to support her husband with the household expenses.

She will use the loan to buy wholesale supplies (cloth, thread, buttons and elastic among other things), which will give her enough material to finish the jobs that she has pending and increase the production of her own line which she can sell in the holiday season.  In this way, she can earn some money to support her family.

Leidiana wants to strengthen her business in the future by selling her own line of blouses, which will give her more of an impact on the market, make her more profit and allow her to create job opportunities.  Then she will improve not only the standard of living of her family, but also that of the people who help her.

loans.use: to buy wholesale supplies (cloth, thread, buttons and elastic among others).

loans.name: Mwangaza Group

texts.fr: Ngoy, femme entrepreneur est présidente du groupe de credit  Mwangaza. Mariée à  un agent de la fonction publique à l’âge de 36 ans, elle est mère de 5 enfants  tous scolarisés. Elle sollicite ce nouveau credit pour s’approvisionner en 10 bidons d’huile de palme. Son objectif est de se constituer les épargnes de 1000$ pour l’achat d’une parcelle.  Elle remercie Hekima  de soutenir les femmes entrepreneurs.
texts.en:
Ngoy is a woman entrepreneur, and president of the loan group 'Mwangaza'.  She is thirty-six years old, and married to a public official.  Ngoy has five children and they all attend school.

Ngoy will use her loan to buy ten drums of palm oil.  Her ambition is to save $1,000 to enable her to buy a plot of land.

Ngoy is grateful to Hekima for the support that they offer to women entrepreneurs.

loans.use: to buy 10 drums of palm oil for resale.

loans.name: Gustavo

texts.es:
El Sr. Gustavo es dueño de un negocio familiar, un  copetín, que se encuentra en una zona bastante populosa, su local está muy bien ubicado, en los alrededores se  encuentran empresas y negocios, cuyos empleados son clientes del mismo, además de los vecinos de la familia, que regularmente adquieren sus productos.
Tiene antigüedad de más de 10 años, experiencia y clientela formada. El mismo es viudo, y el negocio lo maneja con la ayuda de su suegra e hija.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar insumos para su copetín, como ser bebidas, golosinas, galletitas y demás.
texts.en:
Gustavo is the owner of a family business; a fast food stall located in a busy area.  It is well placed because it is surrounded by a lot of businesses whose employees, along with his family’s neighbors, regularly buy his products.

It was established more than ten years ago so he has a lot of experience and a customer base.  He is a widower and his mother-in-law and daughter help him run the business.

This loan will help him buy supplies for his stall, such as drinks, candy and cookies among other things.

loans.use: to buy drinks, candy, cookies and other things.

loans.name: Lali

texts.en:
Lali is a 20-year-old young married woman.  She lives with her husband and 2 kindergarten-aged sons.  Her husband woks as an artisan, taking private orders that generate approximately 400 GEL per month. Lali is unemployed at the moment in spite of having high education.  Currently, she looks after her children, but she has a great desire to be involved in the trading business. 

Lali could not receive a loan from the local financial institutions because of their requirements to have business experience or stable revenue, but does qualify for the start up program offered by Kiva and Credo. The program allows rural poor individuals like Lali the chance to start or re-start a business.  She requested a loan of 1,000 USD to begin trading with home products and clothes.  She plans to go to Turkey and purchase the products at wholesale prices and then resell them among her friends and neighbors. This will allow her the chance to earn income and become financially independent.  This loan will be a great support for the family.  

Lali is thankful to Kiva Lenders for giving her the chance to generate income.

loans.use: To purchase a stock of home products and clothes

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy various products such as cosmetics and shoes, for resale.

loans.name: Celedonio

texts.es:
El Sr. Celedonio está casado con la Sra. Gregoria y tienen varios hijos, todos ya independizados. Se dedica a la carpintería, en la creación y elaboración de muebles en general. Los vende en la capital e interior del país.
Empezó este oficio aproximadamente en el año 1.991, con los conocimientos que fue adquiriendo, con un pequeño capital que fue ahorrando. A medida que corría el tiempo y en vista a que su trabajo fue bien aceptado, tuvo que ir invirtiendo más y más en el negocio. Fue así que acudió a la fundación y accedió a los créditos que le permitieron iniciar su negocio. 
El préstamo que hoy pide lo quiere invertir en la compra de barnices y pinturas para poder usarlos en sus muebles. Agradece por esta nueva oportunidad que está recibiendo que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Celedonio and his wife, Gregoria, have several children who are all independent.  He is a carpenter who creates and produces furniture in general.  He sells them in the capital and in other parts of the country.

He started this business in about 1991 with the knowledge that he picked up and the little money he was able to save.   As time passed he saw how people liked his products and he had to invest more and more in the business.  That is why he asked the foundation for help and started asking for loans to help his business grow.

The loan he is asking for now will be used to buy varnish and paint to use on his furniture.  He is very grateful for this new opportunity, which will help him a lot.

loans.use: to buy paint and varnish.

loans.name: Hermes

texts.es:
El Sr. Hermes es una persona muy trabajadora, sigue con su trabajo de venta de leche de su propio tambo y también en la venta de leña, comenta que su préstamo anterior de kiva lo utilizó en la compra de una vaca lechera que le ayudó bastante a poder seguir con su trabajo.
Es un hombre que lucha y quiere salir adelante para poder ayudar a sus hijos que dependen de el. Hoy pide un nuevo préstamo para la compra de novillos, y así tener mayor cantidad de animales. Agradece por la nueva oportunidad que esta recibiendo, y que le será nuevamente de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Hermes is a very hard-working person. He continues with his job of selling the milk from his dairy farm as well as selling firewood. He says that he used his previous Kiva loan to purchase a milk cow which helped him to continue with his work.

He is a man who wants to get ahead and fights in order to help his children who depend on him. Today he is requesting a new loan in order to purchase bulls, and thereby have a greater quantity of animals. He is grateful for the new opportunity he is receiving and for the great help it will be.

loans.use: to purchase bulls

loans.name: Adolfina

texts.es:
La Sra. Adolfina es dueña una pequeña despensa, venta de bebidas y empanadas desde hace 9 años, es una persona muy amable y trabajadora, se he hecho ya de una buena clientela en su barrio, ya que siempre tiene todo lo que los clientes buscan.
Es viuda, tiene 3 hijos mayores de edad e independizados, y con el fruto de su esfuerzo los ha educado, uno vive con ella y lo ayuda con sus estudios. Comenta que fue muy sacrificado sacar sola a sus hijos adelante, pero que con su sacrificio logró hacer de ellos personas de bien.
Solicita este préstamo para la compra de bebidas y otros insumos como verduras y frutas de esa manera poder surtir su negocio ya que se aproximan las fiestas.
texts.en:
Adolfina has been the owner of a small store, which sells drinks and empanadas, for nine years. She is a very friendly and hard-working person. She has already built up a good clientele in her neighbourhood, since she always has everything the customers are looking for.

She is a widow and has three grown-up and independent children. With effort she has educated them. One of them lives with her and she helps him with his studies. She says that it was very demanding to take care of her children by herself, but that with her sacrifice she managed to make good people out of them.

She is requesting this loan in order to purchase drinks and other supplies, such as vegetables and fruit, so she can stock her business since the festive season is approaching.

loans.use: to purchase drinks and other products, such as fruit and vegetables

loans.name: Ismael

texts.es:
Ismael, a sus 40 años de edad, es una víctima más de desplazamiento forzado, debido a la violencia que se presentó en su pueblo natal; con su familia se trasladó para otra ciudad, temiendo por sus vidas y con el ánimo de buscar mejores oportunidades para salir adelante. Luego de radicarse, comenzó a comercializar productos lácteos de manera independiente, pues compraba queso costeño al por mayor en Montería y además tenía un proveedor de helados y yogurt que le enviaban los productos desde otra ciudad; así comenzó a vender puerta a puerta y en algunas tiendas de barrio del municipio donde reside; los ingresos que percibe son destinados para solventar las necesidades básicas de la familia, conformada por su esposa y dos hijos.
El apoyo del crédito es solicitado con el ánimo de fortalecer su actividad, pues requiere comprar surtido al por mayor (queso costeño, helados y yogurt), esto le permitirá consolidarse en el mercado y mejorar las ventas, para generar mejores ingresos que le permitan ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida a su familia y velar porque sus hijos tengan una educación de mayor calidad para que sean personas prósperas y exitosas.
texts.en:
Ismael, at 40 years of age, is a victim of more than forced displacement due to the violence in his native village. He moved to another city with his family, fearing for their lives and with the intention of looking for better opportunities in order to get ahead in life. After he put down roots, he began to sell dairy products independently. He was purchasing cheese from the coast wholesale in Montería and he had an ice-cream and yoghurt supplier who was sending him products from another city. He began to sell door to door and in some neighbourhood stores in the municipality where he lives. His earnings go towards providing the basic needs of his family, which is made up of his wife and his two children.

The support of the loan is requested with the intention of strengthening his business, as he needs to purchase stock wholesale (cheese, ice-cream, and yoghurt). This will enable him to consolidate himself in the market and improve his sales in order to generate greater revenue, which will allow him to offer a better quality of life to his family and a better-quality education to his children so that they become prosperous and successful people.

loans.use: to purchase stock wholesale (cheese, ice-cream, and yoghurt)

loans.name: Dhaneswar

texts.en: Dhaneswar is a 32-year-old, differently able man living with his parents, brother, wife and daughter in Odisha, a state on the eastern coast of India. His brother is studying in college and his daughter goes to the local school. To support his family, he owns a grocery shop that he has been running for the  last eight years. He sells rice, edible oil, biscuits, spices, and some puja samagris, such as flowers, lentils, fruits, and sweets that are used for God worship at the local temples and family homes in his village. From the shop, he earns 5,000 INR per month.. His father runs a betel shop nearby. Due to his disability, it is hard for Dhaneswar to get around, so his wife and his brother help him to transport grocery items from the market. He is a responsible and hardworking man and dreams of opening a big grocery shop at the nearby market and provide his daughter with a good education. He has applied for a loan of 20,000 to purchase a refrigerator, cold drinks and some perishable items made from milk, like yogurt, and curd.

loans.use: To purchase a refrigerator, cold drinks, and dairy products for his shop

loans.name: Exemple De Borddemer Group

texts.fr:
Antoine est le coordinateur de son groupe Exemple de Borddemer. Il est un commercant. Il habite dans la région BOR-DE-MER où de l’électricité est rare et de l’eau est très limité. Antoine dirigé son commerce de produit divers pendant 10 années. 

Il voudrait utiliser cet emprunt pour investir dans la acheter de produit divers. Il espère que cet emprunt l’aidera à agrandir son business. Les acheter des chaussures, vêtements, cosmétiques, etc. Antoine dit que les défis principal c'est devenus une grande commerçante. Il dit que son but principal et son rêve c'est possède un gros business avec son fond et par la grâce de Dieu.
texts.en:
Antoine is the coordinator of the group 'Exemple de Borddemer'.  He is a trader, and lives in the Bor-de-Mer area, where electricity is rare and water is very scarce.  He has been buying and selling various products for ten years.  

Antoine intends to use his loan to buy various products (such as shoes, clothes, cosmetics, etc) for resale.  He hopes that the loan will help him to expand his business. His biggest challenge is to become a large trader, and he hopes to achieve this through loans and with the help of God.

loans.use: to buy various products such as clothes, shoes and cosmetics, for resale.

loans.name: Nikhila

texts.en: Nikhila is a 38-year-old, differently able man living with his parents, wife and two sons in Odisha, a state on the eastern coast of India. His elder son is studying in the local school. To support his family, he owns a Betel shop that he has been running for the last four years. He sells betel leaf, betel related spices, biscuits, some cosmetics and general household items. He earns 4,000 INR per month from his shop.. His wife sells milk and she helps in Nikhila's business. Due to his disability, it is hard for Nikhila to get around, so his wife helps him to transport grocery items from the market. He is a responsible and hardworking man and dreams of constructing a small house for his family and providing his sons with a good education. He has applied for a loan of 15,000 INR to purchase a refrigerator, cold drinks and cosmetic items for his betel shop to expand the current business. He is very thankful to Kiva for providing this opportunity.

loans.use: To purchase a refrigerator, cold drinks, and cosmetics to expand his shop

loans.name: Nonna

texts.en:
Nonna is a nice 30-year-old lady who lives in Kapan city in the Syunik region. She graduated from Kapan State Architectural University and for three years, she worked at the school as a teacher of Armenian Language and Literature. Since 2005, she has been working at the local TV channel as a journalist. Nonna lives alone, since her parents are still in the village of Artsvanik where she was born.

Nonna is asking for a loan of 500.000 Armenian drams in order to buy a computer, since she needs it for her work. As she says, she must always be aware of all the news in any corner of the world.

loans.use: to buy a computer

loans.name: Eldar

texts.en: Eldar is a 39-year-old married man who lives in Batumi district. He has a school-aged son and a wife, who is a housekeeper. The only source of income for the family is Eldar's salary. He works as an artisan in construction. He generates approximately 450 GEL monthly. His salary, however, is not enough to meet the basic needs of his family. Eldar decided to start another private activity parallel to his current work. He has already purchased a car and now he is requesting a loan to pay the toll for his car and then start a taxi business. He received the credit in the framework of the joint initiative of Kiva and Credo. This Start up Program provides business start-up loans with soft conditions to informal businesses that don't have access to credit products. The loan is very important for him to be able to provide a taxi service and gain income for his family. Eldar relies on the goodwill of the lenders and highly appreciates their support.

loans.use: To pay the toll for his car and start a taxi business

loans.name: Lernik

texts.en:
Lernik is 52 years old and lives in Kadjaran city in the Syunik region. He has studied at the Yerevan State Pedagogical University with the faculty of Biochemistry. For several years, he worked at the school as a teacher of chemistry. Now in the village Dzagedzor, he is a director of the school. Lernik is divorced and he has two sons. Both of them live and work in Yerevan. His elder son is already married and his younger son is going to get married.
 
Lernik is asking for a loan of 700.000 Armenian drams to help his son financially to organize his wedding party.

loans.use: to pay for his son's wedding expenses

loans.name: Tet Fret De Dumas Group

texts.fr:
Antoine est le coordinateur de son groupe Tet Fret de Dumas. Il est un commercant. Il habite dans la région de Dumas où de l’électricité est rare et de l’eau est très limité. Antoine a dirigé son commerce de produit divers et charbon pendant 12 années. Avant de commencer ce commerce, Antoine était un Etudiant. 

Antoine voudrait utiliser cet emprunt pour investir dans le charbon, chaussures, vetement, etc. Il espère que cet emprunt l’aidera à agrandir son business. Des autres membres militant ont besoin d’un emprunt pour tels commerces comme nourriture, cosmetiques, charbon, etc. Antoine dit que son but principal et son rêve c'est possède un gros business avec son fond et par la grâce de Dieu.
texts.en:
Antoine is the group coordinator for the 'Tet Fret de Dumas'.  He is a trader, and lives in the Dumas area, where electricity is rare and water is very scarce.  He has been buying and selling various products and charcoal for twelve years.  Before he began his business, he was a student.

Antoine will use his loan to buy charcoal, shoes and clothes for resale.  He hopes that his loan will help him expand his business.  Other members of the group will use their loans to buy products such as food, cosmetics, charcoal, etc, for resale.

Antoine dreams of using his loans and the help of God, to build a large business.

loans.use: to buy various products and charcoal, for resale.

loans.name: Martun

texts.en:
Martun is 52 years old. In the village of Achanan in the Syunik region, he does farming and agricultural activities.  He is married and has four children (two sons and two daughters). In 1988, he has established a milk and meat-producing cooperative. Then, for several years, he worked as a forester. Now he is fully and seriously engaged in farming and agriculture. He has a plot of land of his own and he rents land on which he cultivates wheat, vegetables and fruits. On his farm, he has 2 cows, a piglet, 20 chickens and 8 rabbits. He also has agricultural equipment and machinery that he uses to cultivate his land. In farming and in the sale of farm products (milk, meat, eggs, vegetables and fruits), his wife used to help him a lot, but now she has serious health problems and she needs surgery urgently.

Martun is asking for a loan of 600.000 Armenian drams to pay for his wife’s surgery.

loans.use: to pay for his wife’s surgery

loans.name: Edgar

texts.en: Edgar is 28 years old and lives in the nice city of Dilijan. He has no higher education and since his childhood, first with his father, and now with his wife, has been engaged in farming. Edgar is married and he has two children.  On his plot of land, Edgar built a barn, where he breeds five cows, two calves and chickens. He manages to sell a lot of eggs, milk, macun (Armenian national dairy product), cheese made by his mother and some meat. Edgar is asking for a loan of 800.000 Armenian drams to buy a lot of hay for his farm cattle, since he wants to provide them with warmth and food for the winter.

loans.use: to buy hay for his cattle

loans.name: La Union Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado la Union está en el 15 ciclo, es un grupo muy emprendedor y que fueron creciendo de apoco, todas ellas son mujeres que trabajan desde muy tempranas horas, todo ello para poder luchar por un futuro mejor para sus familias.
Maxima es parte de este grupo, ella se dedica a la venta de ropas de forma ambulante, y día a día empieza a trabajar desde muy tempranas horas. Su sueño es poder tener su propia tienda de ropa y no tener que trabajar más de forma ambulante. Agradece también por las capacitaciones y la ayuda que están recibiendo.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de prendas variadas para la venta, ya que se acerca la época en que más ventas tiene y quiere poder tener una buena variedad para sus clientes.
texts.en:
The group called “La Union” is in its 15th cycle. It is a very entrepreneurial group and it is slowly growing. All members are women who start working in the very early hours of the morning in order to strive for a better future for their families.

Maxima is a member of this group. She sells clothing door-to-door and starts work very early every day. It is her dream to have her own clothes shop and no longer to have to work selling from door-to-door. She is thankful for the training and the support the group is receiving.

She is asking for this loan to invest in in the purchase of various items for sale, since the time when she makes more sales is approaching and she wants to be able to offer her customers a wide variety of goods.

loans.use: to buy various items for sale.

loans.name: Barot

texts.ru: Барот добродушный и жизнерадостный мужчина в возрасте 46 лет. Он женат и имеет троих детей. Барот живёт со своей женой в небольшом доме в небольшом городке. Чтобы прокормить свою семью он работает, а также  занимается своим бизнесом. Барот работает стоматологом в одной местной стоматологии. Там он получает хорошую заработную плату, но её хватает только на пропитание. А Барот воспитывает троих детей и хочет, чтобы они ни в чём не нуждались. Поэтому чтобы иметь больше дохода, он занимается животноводством и получает от этого бизнеса дополнительный доход. Его жена помогает ему ухаживать и растить скот. Бизнес животноводства приносит хороший доход, поэтому Барот хочет расширить этот бизнес, увеличив поголовье своего скота. Для этого он обратился в Арванд, чтобы получить кредит на покупку скота. Барот очень надеется на положительный результат.
texts.en: Barot, age 46, is a good-natured and pleasant man.  He is married and the father of three children.  He lives with his wife in a modest house, in a small-size city.  In order to provide for his family, he works as a dentist at a local dental practice and he also has his own business.  Although he makes a good income as a dentist, the money he makes is barely enough to feed his family.  As the father of three children, Barot wants to make sure that they are not lacking anything.  In order to bring more money home, he is involved in animal husbandry, which provides an additional income.  His wife helps him to raise and take care of livestock.  Animal husbandry is a very profitable business, and this is why Barot would like to expand his activity in this field by increasing his livestock headcount.  He has turned to Arvand to receive a loan to buy some livestock.  He is really hoping for a positive outcome.

loans.use: to purchase livestock.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan es de la ciudad de Concepción, una persona sacrificada, proviene de una familia de escasos recursos, pero el está luchando por poder salir adelante.
Está estudiando la carrera para ser doctor, y así con su trabajo también poder ayudar a las demás personas. Su meta es poder ser el sostén de su familia.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en sus materiales de estudios, como ser libros y copias. Esta agradecido por esta oportunidad que está recibiendo, que le ayudará muchísimo en su vida de estudiante.
texts.en:
Juan lives in the city of Concepción. He is a very selfless person and comes from a family with little resources, but he is striving to get ahead.

He is studying to become a doctor, and thus he will also be able to help other people through his work. It is his goal to be a pillar of support to his family.

He is asking for this loan to invest it in study materials, for example books and copies. He is very thankful for this opportunity, which will help him a lot in his life as a student.

loans.use: to pay for study materials, for example books and copies.

loans.name: Lorena

texts.es:
Lorena lleva una vida sacrificada ya que se esfuerza para poder culminar sus estudios y de ese modo lograr sus metas la cual es formarse como una profesional capaz para la profesión que eligió.
Está estudiando la carrera de análisis de sistemas que le permitirá ayudar a las personas que necesiten de sus servicios. Ella es una persona muy estudiosa, y comenta que su pilar es su familia.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en pagar sus cuotas, lo cual le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Lorena is living a life with many hardships but she is striving to complete her studies and thus to reach her goal of becoming a professional in the career she chose.

She is studying systems analysis and this will allow her to help other people who need her services. She is a very studious person and says that she is a pillar of support to her family.

She is asking for this loan to be able to pay her university fees, which will be a great help for her.

loans.use: to pay for university fees.

loans.name: Esmelda

texts.es: Es originaria de Puerto Cabezas, tiene 40 años de edad, casada con tres hijos, en edad escolar. Con el propósito de tener su propia fuente de ingresos hace un año estableció su pequeño negocio en el corredor de su vivienda de tambo de madera. Organizó un grupo solidario para gestionar un préstamo en PANA PANA. Actualmente solicita financiamiento para comprar mercadería: Escoba, chivería, granos básicos, papel higiénico, sopas instantáneas, toallas sanitarias. Su sueño es apoyar a su familia, debido a que su esposo es taxista, sin embargo en los últimos meses el taxi ha presentado problemas mecánicos, por lo que no le ha permitido prestar el servicio de transporte y brindarles recursos económicos a su familia. También anhela construir su vivienda de cemento.
texts.en:
She is from Puerto Cabezas, is 40 years old and married with three children who are of school age. In order to have her own source of income, she set up a small business in a wooden booth on the porch of her home three years ago. She organized a solidarity group to take out a loan with PANA PANA.

At present, she is asking for a loan to buy merchandise: a broom, dairy products, bulk grains, toilet paper, instant soups, and sanitary napkins. It is her dream to support her family. Her husband is a taxi driver, but for the last few months the taxi has had mechanical problems and therefore he could not provide transportation services and by this generate financial resources for his family.

Also, she would like to build a concrete home.

loans.use: to buy merchandise: a groom, dairy products, bulk grains, toilet paper, instant soups, and sanitary napkins.

loans.name: Kambarali

texts.ru:
Камбарали мужчина в возрасте 38 лет. Он женат и имеет детей. Его жена домохозяйка занимается воспитанием соих детей и конечно же в свободное время помогает своему мужу в его деле. Камбарали занимается разведением скота. Этим делом занимается уже несколько лет и ему его дело очень нравится. Он получает хороший доход от этого бизнеса. Дополнительно Камбарали занимается сельскохозяйственной продукцией. Он выращивает рис.  Но основной доход в их семье является откорм скота. 
  Каждые две недели  он выводит своих скотов на рынок и перепродает их. Так как сейчас зимнее время он хочет купит скот и корма для скота. Планирует откормить скот и к весне продать по выгодной цене,так как весной скот подорожает. Камбарали решил  обратиться  в Арванд за финансовой поддержкой, так как на данный момент у него на руках нету достаточно денежных средств. 
На полученный кредит Камбарали планирует купить скот и корм для скота,он очень надеется что в Арванде ей помогут и финансово поддержат в реализации его плана.
texts.en:
Kambarali, age 38, is married and he has a few children.  His wife is a homemaker: she takes care of the children but, during her spare time, she also naturally helps her husband run his business.  Kambarali has been involved in animal husbandry for a few years now, and he really enjoys it and makes a good income from this activity.  In addition to raising cattle, he is also involved in rice farming.  However, it is animal husbandry that provides the family with its main source of income.

Every two weeks, Kambarali takes his livestock to the market for resale.  Now that winter is here, he would like to buy more livestock as well as some animal feed.  He is planning to fatten his livestock until the spring and then resell it, since the price of livestock will then go up.

Kambarali has decided to turn to Arvand to receive financial support, because he doesn't have enough money right now.  He plans to use his loan to buy livestock and animal feed, and really hopes to receive some help from Arvand, which will help him to achieve his projects.

loans.use: to purchase livestock and livestock feed.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a group of 100 chicks to raise and resell

loans.name: Lamine

texts.fr:
Lamine est un jeune qui travaille dans le commerce de produits d’art et d’habillements pour artistes ; activité qu’il pratique depuis 2 ans maintenant. Il est célibataire sans enfant et ne dépend pas de ces parents car il se prend en charge. Il a déjà bénéficié d’un crédit à l’IMCEC et ce second lui permettra d’acheter des objets d’art pour renforcer et renouveler son stock, étant donné que c’est la période touristique. Il travaille de 7h du matin à 16h : il peut exposer les produits sur place comme il peut faire l’ambulant. Grâce aux crédits, il peut améliorer son stock et attirer plus de clients.
Lamine a comme ambition, si les moyens sont là, de chercher son propre local et pouvoir améliorer son activé.
texts.en:
Lamine is a young man who is in the business of artistic products and clothing for artists - a business he has been in for 2 years. He is a bachelor without children and does not rely on his parents because he supports himself. He has already received one loan from IMCEC and this second one will allow him to purchase artwork to increase and renew his stock, especially given that it is the tourist season.

Lamine works from 7am to 4pm. He displays his products in the area and walks from sale to sale. Thanks to loans, he can improve his stock and attract more customers. Lamine's goal, if he has the means, is to find his own space and to improve his business.

loans.use: to purchase decorative pieces of art and artists' clothing to resell

loans.name: Amadou

texts.fr:
Monsieur Amadou, âgé de 37 ans, est vigile dans une des IMCECS du centre du Sénégal. Il a fait 20 ans dans le gardiennage dont plus de six ans au service de l’IMCEC. Il travaille de 7h du matin à 19h. Il sollicite ce crédit de 250000F CFA pour célébrer son mariage et faire venir sa femme auprès de lui. Il a comme charge personnelle, le payement de la location et sa popote.
Amadou, vu qu’il a de l’expérience dans ce domaine, rêve de créer sa propre société de gardiennage et ses propres employés.
texts.en:
Amadou is 37 years old and a member of one of the IMCECs in central Senegal. He has been in the babysitting business for 20 years and worked with IMCEC for more than six years. He works from 7am to 7pm.

Amadou is requesting a loan of 250,000 francs CFA to celebrate his marriage and to have his wife come live with him. His personal expenses will be to pay for the rental and the supplies. 

Because has experience in the business, Amadou dreams of opening his own childcare center and having his own employees.

loans.use: to get married

loans.name: Mujeres Buscando Un Futuro Group

texts.es: “MUJERES BUSCANDO UN FUTURO”  es una alcancía conformada por  9 socias. Edith es una de sus integrantes, ella tiene 40 años es conviviente y tiene 4 hijos menores de edad que dependen de los  ingresos de ella y su pareja. Edith es vendedora de productos de belleza, empezó en este negocio hace 15 años y se siente feliz por todo lo que ha logrado ahora tiene muchos clientes y sus ingresos le permiten ayudar a su familia. Sus principales clientes son mujeres. En esta oportunidad quiere invertir su préstamo en la compra de productos de belleza, la temporada navideña es muy buena para las ventas y quiere aprovechar al máximo. Edith y su grupo comunal están agradecidos por el préstamo otorgado, en la foto es la tercera de la izquierda viste polo color azul.
texts.en:
“Mujeres Buscando Un Futuro” is a communal bank consisting of 9 members. Edith is one of its them. She is 40 years old, lives in a common-law marriage and has 4 children under age who depend on the income of Edith and her partner.

Edith sells beauty products. She started this business 15 years ago and is happy about all she has achieved. She has many customers and her earnings allow her to support her family. Her customers are mainly women. This time, she wants to invest her loan in the purchase of beauty products. The Christmas season is a very good time for sales and she wants to take full advantage.

Edith and her communal bank are are grateful for the loan granted. In the picture, she is the third from the left and is wearing a blue polo shirt.

loans.use: to buy beauty products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more palm oil and rice for her business.

loans.name: Ricardo Felix

texts.es: Ricardo está muy agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá compra bisutería de plata ya que él se dedica la venta de bisutería y joyas de plata desde hace 5 años con lo cual tiene ingresos para poder sacar adelante a su familia, así el seguirá luchando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener un local propio para su negocio.
texts.en: Ricardo is very grateful to lenders from Kiva since, thanks to their help, he will be able to buy silver jewelry. He has worked selling silver jewelry and costume jewelry for 5 years, and has been able to use the income earned to support his family. So he will keep pressing ahead in life to be able to realize his big dream which is to have a separate premises for his business.

loans.use: to buy silver jewelry

loans.name: Ekaterine

texts.en:
Ekaterine is 20 years old and from the village of Tsesi. She is single and lives with her mother, brother and retired grandmother. Ekaterine has recently graduated from the local school, but she is unable to get a high education due to her family’s poverty. She stays home and takes care of her family. The only breadwinner in the household is Ekaterine’s mother who works as a sick nurse for a small salary.

In order to generate additional income, Ekaterine is requesting a loan of 450 USD. She will buy stocks of merchandise at wholesale prices to start a clothing sales business in her community. Ekaterine will offer her clients a wide assortment of winter clothing, linens and various household items and give customers the option of paying later for their purchases. The loan will enable Ekaterine to earn a profit and save money to satisfy her everyday needs. She has a great desire to get ahead and awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy stocks of clothing and household items for resale.

loans.name: Abdulwaly

texts.en: Abdulwaly is a 57-year-old married man, and he is the father of three children. He is sacrificing his whole life for their happiness and success. He lives in Taiz, Yemen. He has been running an electrical shop for five years. He has a good relationship with all of his customers. He started his business with a small amount of capital that allowed him to open his business. Due to bad situations in Yemen, he couldn't stock his business with electrical parts. So he is applying for a loan of 200,000 YER from AMB to buy electrical parts like lamps, wires, screwdrivers and fans, since his clientele is increasing. He hopes to continue improving his business and pleasing his customers.

loans.use: to buy electrical parts like lamps, wires, screwdrivers and fans, since his clientele is increasing.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to install a door for his shop and umbrella above the door, which will attract customers and provide a nice look for his shop.

loans.name: Mujeres En Accion Group

texts.es:
Mujeres en Accion está en su ciclo número  8  del programa de comité de mujeres, donde cada una de ellas promete dar su mejor esfuerzo para poder ayudarse y salir adelante, mejorar la situación de sus familias y darles lo que ellas no pudieron tener.
Catalina se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad a sus vecinos y otros clientes ocasionales. Es una persona que desde el inicio mostró muchas ganas de superarse y ayudar a su familia por medio de su trabajo, su sueño es poder tener un local amplio donde pueda hacer sus ventas y así también poder dar a otros trabajo.
Ella solicita este préstamo para la compra de Aceite, harina, azúcar, cernes, panificados, entre otros, lo que le ayudará a tener un mejor stock de productos para sus clientes.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Mujeres en Accion" is in its eighth loan cycle in the women's group program.  Each member is committed to doing her best to get ahead and improve her family's situation, giving them everything she was unable to have.

Catalina sells staple goods to neighbors and occasional customers.  She is someone who, from the beginning, has been very determined to get ahead and help her family througth her work.  Her dream is to have a large shop to sell her goods and to employ more people.

She is requesting a loan to buy oil, flour, sugar, meats, baked goods, etc. to have more products on hand for her clients.

loans.use: To buy oil, flour, sugar, meats, baked goods, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Kuña Rory Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Kuña Rory está en su ciclo 8 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante, través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo dentro del grupo. Todas ellas participan activamente en las actividades propuestas por el grupo, se ayudan mutuamente para llegar a los objetivos en común que tienen dentro del  grupo. 
Norma es una persona que se destaca por su esfuerzo y por su trabajo, ya que se dedica a ser modista y también se dedica a la venta de mercería de todo tipo de productos. Empezó su trabajo con mucho sacrificio, pero hoy ya tiene muy buena clientela gracias a su amabilidad con las demás personas, comenta también que por medio de su labor puede ayudar a su familia con los ingresos que obtiene. Hoy pide de este préstamo ya que quiere invertirlo en la compra de telas e hilos para la confección que hace, y de esa forma poder seguir luchando por su familia y sus seres queridos.
texts.en: The group called Kuna Rory is in its 8th cycle of the programme of the committee of women, where all members work and help themselves to get by in life through the effort and unrelenting work of the group. All of the members are actively involved in the proposed activities of the group, mutually helping themselves reach the common goals that they set out. Norma is a person known for her work ethic, since she is both dressmaker and at the same time works selling all kinds of haberdashery products. She began her work with a great deal of sacrifice, but nowadays she has a very good clientele, thanks to her friendliness with others. She notes also that through her work she has been able to help her family with the income she earns. Today this loan is being requested in order to buy fabric and yarn for dressmaking. With this she will be able to keep working hard for her family and loved ones.

loans.use: to buy fabric and yarn for dressmaking.

loans.name: Asiya's Group

texts.en:
Asiya is a 36-year-old housewife. She lives in Lahore, Pakistan and is the mother of one child. Her husband owns a small restaurant in the market which is the only source of income for the family. He sells a variety of delicious foods in his restaurant.

Presently he needs to purchase a variety of food items to cook delicious food to sell. However, due to a lack of finances he finds it difficult. Therefore his wife Asiya, a member of a two persons lending group, has requested a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan so that she can help her husband to purchase a variety of food items to cook food to sell. With the profit amount her husband wants to grow his business in the future. Asiya is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of food items to cook food to sell.

loans.name: Medardo Elias

texts.es: Medardo está agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su gran apoyo podrá comprar materiales para poder realizar la construcción de un baño en su vivienda, de esta manear podrá ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida y seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño” darle una profesión a sus hijos y poder terminar de construir su vivienda”.
texts.en: Medardo is grateful to Kiva lenders, since thanks to their great support he will be able to buy materials to build a bathroom. This will give him a better quality of life and help him to keep fighting to make his dream reality, which is to find his children a profession and to finish building his house.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Leidy Carolina

texts.es:
Ella escogió estudiar auxiliar de enfermería porque sentía el deber de ayudar a las personas mediante lo mas importante que es la salud. Al ingresar al programa se dio cuenta que la enfermería era mas que el apoyo con conocimiento y ayuda humanitaria, espiritual y sin ninguna clase de interés a parte del humanitario, Esto empezó hace mucho tiempo cuando ella tuvo que ver agonizar y morir a su bis abuela prácticamente la persona que  la crió, debido a un mal procedimiento, desde ese momento siendo muy pequeña decidió ser enfermera pues una medicina era mas de escribir y menos de estar con un paciente en su entorno.
Debido a inconvenientes económicos no pudo iniciar en una universidad, pero asistió a varias ferias de pos grado conoció campo alto y decidió estudiar auxiliar de enfermería, pues es una rama muy importante de la enfermería. Tiene como propósito, terminar sus practicas con la ayuda que hoy le presenta kiva para poder ejercer el auxiliar de enfermería y de allí con sus ingresos y la ayuda de su familia poder especializarse ya sea en UCI o iniciar la carrera de la jefatura.
Ella sabe que debe esforzarse mucho pero siempre tiene presente que por ayudar a la gente que necesita de ella el esfuerzo va a ser muy bien recompensado en su momento.
texts.en:
Leidy Carolina decided to study to be a nursing auxiliary because she felt the need to help people in an area as important as health.  When she joined the program she became aware that nursing was more than lending support through knowledge.  It was something spiritual and no more than humanitarian.  Her awareness began some time ago when she had to watch as her great grandmother agonized and died following a procedure.  She was the person who had practically raised Leidy Carolina.  From that moment on, at a very early age, she decided she wanted to be a nurse because being a doctor was more about writing and less about being close to patients.

Due to economic inconveniences she was unable to go to the university, but was able to attend several graduate fairs and learn about nursing auxiliary studies, which is a very important branch of nursing.  She is committed to finishing her practices with help from Kiva so she can become a nursing auxiliary.  With the income she can earn and help from her family she wants to specialize in ICU or start a supervisory career.  She knows that she must work hard but she always has present that she will have the compensation of helping people.

loans.use: To pay for tuition.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es: La señora Margarita tiene 33 años de edad, vive en el municipio de Monteagudo, en su propio domicilio y trabaja en un ambiente en alquiler en la zona del mercado central, su actividad es la confección de ropa de vestir y deportivas de donde proviene sus ingresos, tiene tres hijos que depende de ella, actualmente vive con su esposo quien trabaja en su taller de carpintería en la fabricación de muebles. Ahora solicita un crédito para la compra de materia prima para confección de prendas de vestir y compra de maquina overlock y collareta, con todo esto podrá incrementar su trabajo y generar mayores ingresos para proporcionarle a su familia mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Margarita, 33, lives in the town of Monteagudo in her own home.  She rents a space near the central market where she works as a seamstress.  She makes clothing and sportswear to earn a living.  She has three children in her care and lives with her husband who works as a carpenter at a furniture manufacturer.

She is requesting a loan to buy materials to make clothing and to buy an overlock/serger machine.  This will help increase her work and generate more income to give her family better living conditions.

loans.use: To buy materials to make clothing and an overlock/serger sewing machine.

loans.name: Mariel

texts.es: La señora Mariel de 27 años de edad, vive con su esposo con el que tiene 1 hijo que depende de sus ingresos. Se dedica a la producción de leche cruda, y para dicha actividad cuenta con 4 cabezas de ganado vacuno lechero, de las cuales 3 se encuentran en producción y 1 se encuentra preñada,  para la alimentación y recolección de leche cuenta con la ayuda de su esposo ya que es una actividad familiar y regular a lo largo del año, pero en realidad el se dedica a prestar servicios de transporte de pasajeros, desde hace 3 años. Actualmente solicita un crédito para la compra de cascara de soya y forraje para su ganado, debido a que en esta época del año escasea el alimento, de esta manera lograra mantener su producción y el nivel de sus ingresos para satisfacer sus necesidades y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Mariel, 27, lives with her husband and son, who she supports with her income.  She produces raw milk and has four head of cattle, three of which provide milk and another one which is pregnant.  Throughout the year her husband helps with the feeding and milking activity, but his real work is in passenger transportation which he has been doing for three years.

Mariel is requesting a loan to buy soy pellets and fodder for her cattle, since this is the season when feed is scarce.  This means she will be able to maintain production and a sufficient income level to cover household needs.

loans.use: To buy soy pellets and fodder for her cattle.

loans.name: Essame

texts.fr: Essame est un femme âgée de 58 ans veuve et mère de 6 enfants. elle a aussi une personne à sa charge. Elle fait l'élevage et vente des poulets depuis des années dans un quartier de la capitale. Son activité se déroule dans les bonnes conditions mais elle désire agrandir son activité en achetant encore plus de poussins ainsi que de la provende pour leur nutrition. C'est pour réaliser ses ambitions qu'il s'est tourné vers nous pour solliciter un financement. Avec ce crédit, elle utilisera une partie pour améliorer son élevage, agrandir ses locaux et renforcer sa position dans le quartier et sur le marché en cette période de fêtes de fin d'années et l'autre partie lui permettra de subvenir aux besoins de sa famille.
texts.en:
Essame is a 58-year-old widow and the mother of six children. She also has an additional dependent in her care. She has been breeding and selling chickens for years in a district of the capital. Her business is carried out under good conditions, but she wants to expand her business to purchase even more chicks as well as the feed required for their nutrition.

To achieve her goals, Essame turned to us to apply for financing. With this loan, she will use a portion to improve her farm, expand her premises, and improve her position in the district and at the market during the end of the year festivities. The remainder of the loan will allow her to support her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional chicks to raise and sell.

loans.name: Edgar

texts.es: Edgar está muy agradecido con el apoyo que  le están brindando los prestamistas podrá comprar abono y fertilizantes ya que Edgar se dedica a la agricultura y ha sembrado maíz hibrio; de esta manera podrá mejorar su cultivo y poder tener una buena cosecha, lo que le permitirá mejorar sus ingresos y seguir luchando para poder darle a su familia un futuro mejor.
texts.en: Edgar is very grateful for the support he is receiving from the lenders.  He will be able to buy fertilizers for his agriculture business.  Edgar has planted hybrid corn and will be able to improve cultivation and obtain a good harvest.  This means he will improve his income and continue working to give his family a better future.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers.

loans.name: Lydie

texts.fr: Lydie est une femme de29 ans célibataire et mère  d'un enfant de 12 ans. Elle est commerçante et dispose d'une vente à emporter dans un quartier de la ville depuis 09 mois déjà. Elle bénéficie d'une bonne expérience dans le domaine et s'approvisionne dans des dépôts, son activité fonctionne bien car elle est la seule à exercer cette activité dans son secteur. Cependant, son capital ne lui permet plus de satisfaire toute sa clientèle qui ne cesse de grandir chaque jour. Elle voudrait avec ce crédit augmenter les casiers de boisson  afin de satisfaire la demande de sa clientèle face à l'approche des fêtes de fin d'année. cela va également augmenter son chiffre d'affaire ainsi que son bénéfice. les revenus générés lui permettront de mieux subvenir aux besoins de sa famille et d'agrandir son activité.
texts.en:
Lydie is a 29-year-old single mother of a 12-year-old child. She is a merchant and has been running a takeaway stall in a district of the city for the past nine months. She has a good experience in her field and purchases her supplies in warehouses, and her business is doing well as she is the only vendor in her area with this type of business.

However, her capital does not allow her to meet the ever-increasing demand of all her clientele. She wants to use this loan to increase her stock of bottled drinks to satisfy customer demand during the approaching end of the year festivities. She will be able to increase her turnover as well as her overall earnings. The income she earns will enable her to better meet the needs of her family, and to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase bottled drinks for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more rice, fish, onion, coal, oil, etc. to increase her sales.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is a 20 year old single young man from Deri El Balah city.  He lives with his family in a small simple house.  His fatger works as an employee in a local firm.  This is the only source of income for the family.  Ahmad is a student in the university where he studies English Literature.  He would like to finish his studies and earn BA degree and find a job as a teacher. 

Ahmad took a USD Murabaha loan from FATEN.  This loan will help him to buy a new laptop for his studies.  By taking this loan, Ahmad will be able to do his homework and read articles.  Ahmad appears in the photo

loans.use: to buy a new laptop for his studies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and a weighing scale

loans.name: Rafat

texts.en:
Rafat is a 21 years old single young man from Deri El Balah city.  He lives with his family in a small simple house.  His brother works as an employee in a local firm.  This is the only source of income to the family.  Rafat is a student in the university where he studies public relations and marketing.  He would like to finish his studies, earn his BA degree and find a job.
 
Rafat took a USD Murabaha loan from FATEN.  This loan will help him to buy a new laptop for his studies.  By taking this loan, Rafat will be able to do his homework and read articles.  Rafat appears in the photo

loans.use: to buy a new laptop for his studies

loans.name: Salif

texts.fr:
Mr SALIF est célibataire sans enfant.
Il  est étudiant  en classe de Licence III  professionnelle à l’ESTPO (Ecole Supérieure des Travaux Public de Ouagadougou) depuis  03ans. 
Mr veut financer ses études supérieures.
Après les  études son ambition est d’être un ingénieur des travaux publics en génie civil  et ensuite profiter de son professionnalisme créer sa propre entreprise qui va donc participer au développement de son pays.
texts.en:
Salif is single and he has no children. He is a student in the class of Professional License III at the ESTPO or "Ecole Supérieure des Travaux Publics de Ouagadougou" (Ouagadougou Graduate School for Public Works), where he has been studying for three years. Salif wants to finance his graduate studies.

After he finishes his studies, Salif's ambition is to be a civil engineer for public works, and later on to benefit from his profession and create his own company which would contribute to the development of his country.

loans.use: to finance his graduate studies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Adama

texts.fr:
Mr  ADAMA est célibataire avec 01 enfant. Elle  a 18mois et ne va pas à l’école et  il a 02 personnes  à sa charge (le bébé et sa mère).
Il  est étudiant en classe de licence III  professionnelle à l’ESTPO (Ecole Supérieure des Travaux Public de Ouagadougou) depuis  03ans. 
Mr  veut financer ses études supérieures.
 Il ambitionne être chef  d’entreprise et se marier avec la mère de sa fille.
texts.en: Adama is a single man who has one child. She is 18 months old, and she does not go to school. Adama has two dependents (the baby and its mother). He is a student in the class of Professional License III at the ESTPO or "Ecole Supérieure des Travaux Publics de Ouagadougou" (Ouagadougou Graduate School for Public Works), where he has been studying for three years. Adama wants to finance his graduate studies. He aspires to become an entrepreneur and to marry his daughter's mother.

loans.use: to finance his graduate studies.

loans.name: Anne Elise

texts.fr: Anne une Femme âgée de 41 ans, elle vie en concubinage et est mère de 02 enfants qui vont tous encore à l'école. Elle est commerçante et dispose d'une vente à emporter dans un quartier de la cité capitale depuis  04 ans environ. Elle bénéficie d'une bonne expérience dans le domaine. mais son capital ne lui permet plus de satisfaire toute sa clientèle qui est parfois obligée de se retourner vers la concurrence. Ceci à cause de la petitesse de son capital . Elle voudrait avec ce augmenter les casiers de boisson  afin de satisfaire la demande de sa clientèle. cela va également augmenter son chiffre d'affaire ainsi que son bénéfice. les revenus générés lui permettront de mieux subvenir aux besoins de la famille.
texts.en:
Anne is a 41-year-old woman who lives with her partner. She is the mother of two children who still attend school. She is a merchant, and has had a takeaway stall in a district of the capital city for about four years.

She has the benefit of good experience in her field, but her lack of capital does not allow her to meet the demand of all her customers, who are sometimes forced to turn to the competition. She wants to use this loan to increase the number of cases of bottled drinks she can purchase to better satisfy customer demand. She will also be able to increase her turnover and earnings. The income she earns will enable her to better meet the needs of her family.

loans.use: to purchase bottled drinks for resale.

loans.name: Armine

texts.en:
Armine is 22 years old and she lives in Yerevan. She has a higher education and now she works at a pawnshop as a loan specialist. Previously Armine used to work at a computer shop, then at a car service center as an accountant.

Armine lives with her parents and two brothers. Her father works at the Academy of Sciences as a research associate, her mother is a teacher of physics at the school, her elder brother also works at the Academy as a biologist, and her second brother owns his own business. Thanks to all their savings together, Armine’s family managed to repair their house, but now they are short of money and they cannot furnish their guest room.

Armine asks for a loan of 400,000 Armenian drams which, with their saved money, will be enough to buy furniture for their guest room.

loans.use: to buy furniture for their guest room

loans.name: Dora Lilia

texts.es:
Ella es Dora, vive en una ciudad capital, estudia y trabaja en busca de un mejor futuro.
En el trabajo solamente gana un sueldo mínimo y no cuenta con ningún apoyo económico, de este sueldo paga arriendo, servicios públicos, estudio, alimentación, transportes y ayuda a sus padres.
Proviene de una familia humilde del campo, tiene nueve hermanos. Empezó a trabajar desde los 16 años en casas de familia como empleada doméstica, para así poder ayudar a sus padres  y seguir estudiando, porque sus padres no contaban con los recursos suficientes para brindar una buena educación a sus hermanos y a ella.
Solamente estudió hasta quinto de primaria, cuando empezó a trabajar, siguió estudiando por sus propios medios, para ser bachiller.
Trabajó durante 6 años, en casas de familia y luego decidió cambiar de empleo. Durante un tiempo trabajó como impulsadora con empresas temporales, pero estas empresas no le brindaban una estabilidad laboral, solamente era por temporadas.
Actualmente trabaja como operaria de aseo y está estudiando auxiliar de servicios farmacéuticos, para tener un mejor empleo y contar con un mayor ingreso económico y de esta manera continuar con una carrera profesional, tener su casa propia, tener su propio negocio, y poder brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
This is Dora.  She lives in the capital city, is in school, and is working toward a better future.

At work she only makes minimum wage and has no financial support. She pays for rent, utilities, school, food, transportation, and she helps my parents with my salary.

She comes from a humble family from the country and has nine siblings.  She started working when she was 16 as a housekeeper in private homes so she could help her parents and keep going to school because her parents did not have enough to provide Dora and her siblings with a good education.  

She had only reached the fifth grade of primary school when she started working and she kept on going to school, paying her own way so she could graduate.

She worked in private homes for six years and then she decided to get a different job.  For a while she worked as a promoter for seasonal businesses, but these businesses did not provide her with job stability as they were only temporary.  

She currently works as a janitor and she is studying to be a pharmacy assistant so she will have a better job and make more income and go on to have a professional career, her own house, her own business, and be able to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to study
